title: Sudoku

comments: This is a very good game and I highly recommend it but there are two small changes I would make.    1) I would make it so that you can move the object in your village i.e. trees, rocks as there are afew seasonal decoration that I would like to keep but they are getting in the way of my village.    2) I would also make it so that you can put more then 1 builder on a construction to cut down its time or add more builder.    But other then them 2 changes I think it's a great game and I've had lots of fun with it.

The heroes should be for all players from the lower level. They can make their own choice to choose the hero or switch them. If you provide the better or strongest hero for the strong one, it means the stronger is still the better and even the best. The weaker will have no choice,  but accepting the unfair attack from those strong ones. Please think about it again. Be fair for all players. Otherwise, the stronger or the best ones are still the stronger and the best ones. How about the weak ones? Do they have a chance to use their strategy? It's the strategy game, not for only the big or strong players. Thanks!!...

Super game my favourite game really nice guys download it .I have A small request if we have got any bonus in war or Multiple battles it automatically goes in Clan Castle ,and when we want withdraw it give whole treasure comes out. So if U keep a device ,in which we can type how much  amount of  treasure we want to withdraw. It will be great honor if U put it in next update.

It is a good family game and it is a way to play with lots of friends and even make some new friends in your clan. It does not take lots of money to complete they game it only takes skill and dedication. I have played this game for years and have had many different accounts on it, but you just have to dedicate your self to one on those accounts to get a good high level account

What happened to the game I used to enjoy? Now everything is turning into a spam fest. Strategy has been consistently removed from the game with each update. BH still has a bunch of AI issues. For the first time ever (as a max 11 and misc other accounts) I can honestly say uninstalling has crossed my mind.

Coc is on the first place in my games list. It is very addictive and enjoyable. I am looking forward till the day town hall 12 comes. I am not much happy with SUPERCELL ID thing. Because it is not much easy to use. I recommend using the normal GOOGLE PLAY sign in method because it is much more appropriate for me. Overall COC have become my life. I also recoomend to have a time limit for coc, like coc automatically switch off if the user plays coc more than 1 hour. Long Live COC!

comments: I absolutely love this game. I spend a lot of time on it! It's fairly balanced between players who play for free and those who purchase gems to give their bots better stats. You can easily rank up without paying a dime. I did for so long, until I kept hoarding pieces and didn't want to sell. I began to use gems instead of coins.

This game is have potential, don't ruined it because of money. I have never been watching so many ads In my life just to get some 2 stars parts. Instead of being creative and making cool machines, this game is turning to - either pay to win or watch alot of ads to win. What's the point of "playing" in this game?

I think this app is great! But there is a slight problem with selling items. When I repeatedly sell items, sometimes if, for example, I was selling an item for 6831 coins, then it would subtract 6831 from the total amount of coins I have and then add back in 6831 so I'd end up with just the same amount of coins I was at! Could you please fix this small bug? It would make this app even better!

Developers, please read.  First, this is a fun game and I enjoy its play style. It's reminiscent of TV shows like Battles Bots and game series' like Bot Arena.   Second, I would like to suggest giving players the ability to add, delete, and move weapon, utility, and wheel anchors. In the same way players can currently add enhancements to parts and chassis's and move around stickers.   Third, It would be appreciated if Quick Play Super Boxes replaced Regular Boxes after all shipment slots are full. It would provide a greater incentive to keep playing Quick Play beyond just Winning Streak Crown Rewards.  I'm offering these suggestions because I really enjoy this game and would like to see it become a more fulfilling and personalized experience.  Thank you,

Fun strategy game, just wish it was easier to understand upgrades and easier to get a decent vehicle. Sometimes you have to wait for boxes other times you can watch ads to get thru them with no rhyme or reason as far as I can tell. The variety or maybe the lack of variety in boxes is pretty annoying. Sometimes you get the exact same part multiple times or with slight variations, which can drag out trying to get a decent upgrade on things.

Its now just a money grab... not happy with the way this game is going, it used to be a fair rewards system, with decent quality gear, then it changed to become basic gear almost all of the time, then it became difficult to prestige since it was have good rockets and a lifter or don't win and now you actually get very little for your hard work climbing the ranks. Waiting 24 - 48 hours for a reward doesn't cut it for me.

Would help keep players more interested. My only dislikes so far. I most definitely enjoy the game and think it's pretty awesome!

Best game period. Not just golf or sports game, but any game. Wouldn't change a thing. All ya all who say, oh they need to change this or that, and why do I have to play someone who's better than me? Well it's because you suck, and you have no hand eye coordination. Just shut up and dribb, uh I mean play. #1 game for a reason peeps. Love ya. Dueces. Peace biatches.

Game is based on luck. Could be so much better if it was more realistic ie club selection. How can it be fair when it is easier to chip in from off the green than it is to hole a putt? NEED TO FIX BUG THAT MAKES MY SHOT HAPPEN WITHOUT MY FINGER LEAVING TABLET SCREEN!!! HAS COST ME HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF COINS!!! When are you going to fix this issue??? If this was my game I would be extremely embarrassed with all the fault's

Stop changing the winf its getting boring now !!  I mastered the wind only for ypu to make it not work in in some games or even make the wind twice as strong as the value stated. You should be matched on games played not trophies. Otherwise the good players who go up the trophies quickly always play people with better clubs. The game goes easy on you if you're not good at it which defeats the point of getting good

This game is really starting to piss me off.  Main issue I'm having is the stupid game freezing and telling me it's trying to reconnect in the middle of a game.  I'll make a shot then it will continue to count me down and tell me I'm out of time.  Freezes until my times up. I've lost close to 200k in coins lately and it's really starting to piss me off. Also, never consistent. I'll make a near identical shot as my opponent and ball travels completely different. Really starting to piss me off. Been playing this game for a LONG time and I'm about ready to delete it!

It's cool but everyone seems to be fairly good so all matches come down to a shoot out. Meh. And in the shootouts your opponent can see ur shot if u go first. Meh. All kinds of perks for FB. I don't have FB. Meh. Have to spend $$ to get decent clubs and balls or play this 24/7 and I won't do either lol. Nice try tho playdemic. Cheers.

comments: I think this game is brilliant. An absolute pleasure to play and I never get bored. This game should be voted one of the best games ever. Obviously I like other games but this is a whole different story. I just wanted to say please make it so u can join lower levels friends? I can't join my sister and were only five levels apart.

I LOVE this game My only complaint is in campaign mode it's said more worlds coming soon for YEARS!!! If they're not going to add a world eny time soon  they should at least change the coming soon part. But overall this is a good game and it seems like Cubic Games really care about what the consumers think.

This used to be really cool. If you want to be strong buy gem weapons. It is too hard too earn coins or.gems. Also your opponents must be with same armor or level. I once fought a guy with the minigun shotgun and diamond armor and before I rekt everyone with the demoman but now it sucks

This game is so good! I have played this game when it was in its early stages, and it was pretty good. Now it has gotten even better than before, with lots of multiplayer game options and lots of weapons and gadgets to choose from. There is one problem, which is when I got this game about a month or two ago, the prices to upgrade guns were pretty low for coins but ok for gems, but now they are ok for coins and WAY TO MUCH for gems, so I ask of you developers to please decrease the amount of gems it takes to upgrade gem bought guns.

This game is the best I have ever played on a phone tons of maps, game modes, hundreds of guns, different tools, gear, and lots of skins. There is just so many things you can do. I also like it because it is a challenge something I would play. That's why I rated this game 5 stars.

I don't like this update. Why does it cost so much to upgrade  weapons 2 more damage higher. And I don't like the fact that all the weapons that have low stars are nerfed. When I was on level 6 the hellraiser was a beast. Then when I got to level 7 I it wasn't as good, so I tried to upgrade it. BUT the price cost 120 coins. I am really disappointed about this. I played this game for 2 years and it sad to see how hard it is to win. They only want money that's it. Make your game better and fair. It's so unbalanced.
description: Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games!  Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.  This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield!  It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players! *** MULTIPLAYER MODES***  Deathmatch mode benefits:  • WORLDWIDE and local.  • unique maps of various shapes and sizes.  • Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.  • Up to 8 players in one game.  • Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle! • Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!  *** COOPERATIVE MODE ***  Cooperative mode features:  • Up to 4 Players in one game.  • Chat is available as well! • 8 special maps. • Hardcore gameplay.  • Coins as a prize for top results.  *** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***  In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!  Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.  New cool features in a campaign mode:  • A new training camp for first-timers.  • More detailed graphics.• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds. • Cool new songs• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!  Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!  Main Features of a campaign mode:  • Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.  • A lot of absolutely different maps.  • Many types of zombies and enemies.  • Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.  • Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!  • Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.*** SKINS MAKER ***  Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!  ——————————————————————————————————This is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers.
descriptionHTML:
Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games! Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.

This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield! It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players!

*** MULTIPLAYER MODES***

Deathmatch mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE and local.
• unique maps of various shapes and sizes.
• Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.
• Up to 8 players in one game.
• Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle!
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!

*** COOPERATIVE MODE ***
Cooperative mode features:
• Up to 4 Players in one game.
• Chat is available as well!
• 8 special maps.
• Hardcore gameplay.
• Coins as a prize for top results.


*** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***
In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!
Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.

New cool features in a campaign mode:
• A new training camp for first-timers.
• More detailed graphics.
• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds.
• Cool new songs
• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!

Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!

Main Features of a campaign mode:
• Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.
• A lot of absolutely different maps.
• Many types of zombies and enemies.
• Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.
• Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!
• Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.

*** SKINS MAKER ***
Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!

Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!

description: Race through Heartlake City in LEGO® Friends: Heartlake Rush! comments: I have crashed a ridiculous amount of times in the new update. And guess what? If it doesn't crash, it lags so bad that it makes it impossible to play. Its a good game when it works, which isn't very often for me. And now when I was riding in a three wheeler and a enemy started driving and I crashed, then when I got back I was out of the three wheeler and in the middle of a fire fight and died

I love the game over all. There is one thing that ticks me off the cars. people get them then chase u and knock u down. Once u r knocked down they get out of the car and kill u. IT'S RIDICULOUS. The fact that you cant shoot through the fences makes it so others can use them as coves while u move to them and get killed

Before the update its just normal lag that I used to. But after the update, its getting more lag + delay when try to look around. What I mean is you know when your finger is not sync with character movement (uhh how do I explain this). Sorry my english is terrible. Idk if you get what Im trying to explain. Like 0.5 second delay when look left look right look up look down. Its very hard to aim at enemy and looting and stuff. All of this happen after the Feb 28 update.

This is F ridiculous!! I experienced more glitches after the update!! The updates didnt do anything much about the glitches!! People will just appear from nowhere!! I played this game everyday and every single day i always experience glitches!! The sound is also confusing even if you try to listen.You hear sounds that coming from the back but the enemy is actually in front.

No complaints about the game, i liked it. It's just that i lost my account today and i dont know what's the cause. last time i played it i closed the game when i finished a match by pressing the home button and left it there for a few hours. when i open the game again my account was lost. i forgot to bind my account to any social media because i thought i already binded it by sharing to facebook. is there any way you guys can help me ?

Hi, i really enjoyed the game, i play it every day for a few monts. But one thing that really bother is this game still have a lot of bugs, and cheater - how can enemy shot me while i was behind the tree? And we can get shot too while hiding behind the wall. Please fix this. And one thing, you need to change your system on buying some box. I kept getting the same clothing

comments: This game is very fun and addictive but should have offline mode so we don't have to deal with a hacker every game.  Also after new update I'm having issues getting into the game. It says "check comnection" and my connection is fine even tried uninstalling it and all. Other games work on my phone and so does my Wi-Fi. The game just worked last night for me now it doesn't! PLEASE FIX!!

Please bring back the old brewery map. I have been a long time player of this game, and loved the original brewery map. The new update of the map is so radical that it feels like an entirely different map, with all the pathways and corners. The uniqueness of the original brewery map is that it is small, and relatively open, so that combat is focussed and fun. There is more time fighting others than moving around trying to find enemy players. The new update just ruins that uniqueness, making it feel like the Bureau or Legacy map. I am okay with the new brewery map being a new addition, but please make it "Brewery 2" and bring back the original Brewery.

Could you please add an offline mode...would be nice to practice on the go. Also please please please add more guns. I have been playing this game for a year and still no new guns but glad you are keeping up with the maps. I have this HUGE problem, it says check connection when I have good connection. I tried to restart my phone and reconnect but still doesn't work. PLEASE FIX.

Just good. This game is great. The controls are completely customizable so you can make it work the way you want it to. Graphics are on point, better than 2nd Gen consoles, lesser than 3rd gen. If this game came out in the age of the PS2 I would have bought it. Also, buy a box because this game couldn't have been cheap to make. This game should cost like $25.

I love C-OPS. It is one of the best FPS games for Apple and Android devices. It is very popular, few servers are empty. On lowest settings with 2 gigabytes of RAM, it runs at a BUTTERY 50 frames per second. Also, controls can be customized. I just notice a few graphical glitches.

I love the game, it's great and there's not many fps games like these for mobile phones. My only problem is I can never play ranked. For whatever particular reason I can't even find other players. The game just stays searching forever and I really want to play ranked. I would have voted 5 stars but thats the only thing that bugs me. Please fix and will be happy to give 5 stars.
description: Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter ?Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard.  Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!The game currently features 2 game modes: Defuse and Team Deathmatch.In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase camos to customize your favorite weapons.Follow us on social media:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGameYoutube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEntPrivacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/Terms of Service: http://criticalopsgame.com/terms/
descriptionHTML:
Are you ready for a no-nonsense, action packed first person shooter ?

Critical Ops is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Fight for domination alongside your friends, or show the world your skill by leading the individual scoreboard. Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!

Game currently in Alpha phase: Critical Ops is still under development, but you can download and play the game now! We will keep working on the game continuously to fix bugs, improve optimization and add a ton of new features and content to the game!

The game currently features 2 game modes: Defuse and Team Deathmatch.
In defuse the terrorists try to plant and explode a bomb while the counter-terrorists try to prevent the bomb from exploding.
In Team Deathmatch the teams compete for dominance within a time limit.

Critical Ops is not and will never be pay-to-win: Purchase camos to customize your favorite weapons.

Follow us on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CriticalOpsGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CriticalOpsGame
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/CriticalForceEnt

Privacy Policy: http://criticalopsgame.com/privacy/

comments: What really drew me into this game was the the Pac-Man promotion, I love a good crossover and I can say with total certainty that I wouldn't be playing it if I couldn't play as Pac-Man, he's such a good inclusion. It's a super addictive game, setting it aside to do something else is quite difficult, hours go be seamlessly when playing it. The graphics as well are beautiful, very vibrant and colourful.   I have a few minor gripes with the game though, it crashed on me and when I restarted the game I had briefly lost all my content, that gave me a minor scare. The game is heavily geared towards microtransactions as well, unless you're prepared to pay money, get ready for a very, very long grind trying to get the stuff you want. Having said all that I absolutely love the game, very glad I downloaded it.
Game looks good and it's well design, but far too many gimmicks and interruption. Hardly ever can actually run. Plus some silly hanging in the air for no reason. Got bored in 5 m

This game is one of the best out there. Now I know it might seem like a remake of Subway Surfers or any other endless runner game out there, but I must say, Sonic Dash is much more than that. You can do way more in this game than you could in Subway Surfers. I would recommend this game of you haven't tried it. It's occupies time and above all else, this is a great game!
This is a pretty cool sonic game for moblie for 1 it's cool for 2 you can unlock other sonic Characters and for 3 other characters from other games will come too like Mrs. Pac man!
Sonic is my favorite and I know all the forms but put all in the game for 100 or 150 red rings. I'm sonic number one fan ! Plz do it .
I love the new updated keep up the good work and thank you for making us vs people online this the way to earn more rings and red stars rings

comments: It's honestly a pretty good game, it's fun, even though there's no real end goal and a lack of side quests. Although many improvements can be made to the game, the worst part is the ads, it's really bad, and it's insulting as a player that they try to milk this much out of us. You have constant random ads that take over your game at any moment. 5 ads per chest you craft to unlock each slot, ads when you switch to the map, floating treasure chests that require ads to open, even more pointless ads at every crafting bench, and the list goes on. I would gladly even pay to play an ad free version, but this is just ridiculous.

You cannot walk on wooden fundations and you cannot walk on single or double foundations. Please fix this it is very annoying and im not able to play the game, because when the shark attacks in a corner you cannot hit him with your spear. This is the same for the zombie. I built a little house on the raft and it spawned behind the wall of my house. Please fix it
Its a awesome games but the problem is the aids!! This game same like (last day on earth survival) so guys i hope u remove the poor aids okay
How do you use the boat dingy thing  I created every item of it and I have all the items I need but I can't use the boat and it's confusing
When will there be quests?  I'm up to level 10 and have a badass raft but there is nothing to do and I can't build the chemistry table. I have no way to get mortar and pedestal.
Has broken English.  But other than that,  good game.

Your home is an endless ocean. Your neighbors – ruthless sharks, sea creatures and relentless nature. The only refuge is a raft. Improve it, craft everything you need to escape from the ocean trap, survive by all means!

Check your health, hunger and thirst indicators, struggle sharks attacks. Meet the challenges and try to survive, it’s all up to you!

Use a hook and catch necessary resources: wreckage, chests and barrels from the ocean. They will help you to survive!

Expand, develop and protect your raft. If you need more place, build a first floor!

Fish, cook and collect drinking water. Craft building materials, clothes, weapons, chests and other necessary things to survive!

No two worlds are alike: you can generate completely new and randomized world at any time in the survival free.

Survivor app has treacherous weather conditions that allow to enjoy sunny days and beware of stormy ones. If you’d like to get new skills in survive games, try raft games!

Bearing in mind all these qualities of build and survive games, you’d not forget about your health status in the harsh conditions. Fishing and hunting is the only way to succeed and not to starve to death in raft survival in the ocean.

• 3D interface of raft free

description: The wildly popular Toca Kitchen is back! With new guests to cook for, more tools to play with and new food combinations to test out, Toca Kitchen 2 invites all chefs to get messy and start playing!GET CREATIVEWho said dishes have to be pretty and tasty? In Toca Kitchen 2 you can cook however you want! Juice tomatoes, boil the salad or make a burger. Come up with your very own recipes and treat your guests to something special.MAKE A MESSWith six different kitchen tools to choose from, you have the perfect setup for preparing fun foods! Load up with your favorite ingredients, add a squeeze of messiness and finish off with a pinch of weirdness. Time to let your guest have a bite! Was it a winner?WATCH THEIR REACTIONSDiscover your guests’ preferences by watching their reactions. Oven-baked fish head with fried leftovers and lettuce juice coming right up! Oh, they didn’t like it? Try adding some salt. It’s fun to get the “ew”!We added a whole lot of fun stuff! You can now enjoy cooking:New foods!- Chicken- Prawn- Pineapple- Corn- Peach- Strawberry- Watermelon - Onion- Octupus leg- Spaghetti- RiceNew condiments!- Ketchup- Dressing- SoyWatch the characters react on burning hot sauce, sour lemon and laugh at loud burps.At last but not least, we added more levels of grossness to the characters. Have fun!Features:- New ingredients in the fridge- New characters to feed- Stronger character reactions- New juicer and oven- Deep fryer! You can now deep fry anything. Get your crust on.- No rules or stress - just open-ended, kid-directed fun!- No third-party advertising- No in-app purchases***Subscribe to our YouTube channel!http://bit.ly/YouTube_GooglePlay***ABOUT TOCA BOCAAt Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 130 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.PRIVACY POLICYPrivacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy
descriptionHTML:
The wildly popular Toca Kitchen is back! With new guests to cook for, more tools to play with and new food combinations to test out, Toca Kitchen 2 invites all chefs to get messy and start playing!

GET CREATIVE
Who said dishes have to be pretty and tasty? In Toca Kitchen 2 you can cook however you want! Juice tomatoes, boil the salad or make a burger. Come up with your very own recipes and treat your guests to something special.

MAKE A MESS
With six different kitchen tools to choose from, you have the perfect setup for preparing fun foods! Load up with your favorite ingredients, add a squeeze of messiness and finish off with a pinch of weirdness. Time to let your guest have a bite! Was it a winner?

WATCH THEIR REACTIONS
Discover your guests’ preferences by watching their reactions. Oven-baked fish head with fried leftovers and lettuce juice coming right up! Oh, they didn’t like it? Try adding some salt. It’s fun to get the “ew”!

We added a whole lot of fun stuff! You can now enjoy cooking:

New foods!
- Chicken
- Prawn
- Pineapple
- Corn
- Peach
- Strawberry
- Watermelon
- Onion
- Octupus leg
- Spaghetti
- Rice

New condiments!
- Ketchup
- Dressing
- Soy

Watch the characters react on burning hot sauce, sour lemon and laugh at loud burps.

At last but not least, we added more levels of grossness to the characters. Have fun!

Features:
- New ingredients in the fridge
- New characters to feed
- Stronger character reactions
- New juicer and oven
- Deep fryer! You can now deep fry anything. Get your crust on.
- No rules or stress - just open-ended, kid-directed fun!
- No third-party advertising
- No in-app purchases

***

Subscribe to our YouTube channel!
http://bit.ly/YouTube_GooglePlay

***

ABOUT TOCA BOCA
At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play to spark kids’ imaginations and help them learn about the world. We design our products from the kids' perspective to empower kids to be playful, to be creative and to be who they want to be. Our products include award-winning apps that have been downloaded more than 130 million times in 215 countries and offer fun, safe, open-ended play experiences. Learn more about Toca Boca and our products at tocaboca.com.

PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy is an issue that we take very seriously. To learn more about how we work with these matters, please read our privacy policy: http://tocaboca.com/privacy

comments: This is an awesome game that gives you daily and weekly quest's and offers treasure chests. Now they have new levels to play and collect like blazing sands, and the spooky summit level for Halloween. Then they added the new global challenges.This game just keeps growing, not like many of the other games that just stays the same..you will be amazed. Now they added Global challenges, with new head gear...like I said this game keeps growing...it runs so smooth and the graphics are awesome. If you haven't tried it. Do it. If you have come back and be amazed at the changes.

Thx for updating Frozen Shadows. Blazing Sands still needs work. Too much water, not enough Sand. Needs a "slide," I recommend sand surfing. The canyons also get boring. The variations between it and the other levels don't compare, especially for the gem cost to play it. Still, fun and relaxing, and stays fun. 4/5.

Nice, good, adventure game.but some times your team irritating who one completed thirteen level they will easily get diamond  your giving master challenge ( now the challenge Chinese New year )who one complete your giving thirty diamond only.this offer will useful only for entry level gamers. Most of players finished fourteen level so they no need diamonds.so think about genius players.

I love all the graphics it's a bit like the        piano tiles it test's your fast skills but except it is temple run 2 love it. Except for the controls though cause sometimes if i turn it to right it goes to left and sometimes it bumps into the tree same to the left you need to fix the controls more.

It's my favorite app. I love it a lot. My only issue is that it doesn't quite accurately update my stats especially my highest score without using a 'save me,' longest run, most coins & gems. I would really like the developers to look into that but otherwise it's a brilliant game.

I love this game, very addicting. And I love that it has the daily, weekly and global challenges. As well as objectives and the daily chest challenges. Lots of things to work for and win. Makes the game more fun. Plus, so far, I haven't come across anything that I've had to spend money on in order to advance in the game

comments: My game is literally unplayable right now. For about a week now, it has randomly just lagged out and would take 5 seconds for every action to actually take place. Now, when i boot up the game, it just freezes when i click on anything. My shop tries to open but just goes to a black screen and freezes. I will try to play for a few more days, but if i cant play by the end of the weekend, i will be deleting the game.

What is wrong with the newest update? I can't acquire my item from the switch shop. Every time I click on get item, the black screen goes to the top left of the screen. And I can see the normal background picture. When that happens I have to close the game and reset. I've tried to get the item 20 times and it does that every time.

Was a great game til the update. Now I have to open it twice for my energy to update and for the money in the pawn shop to change. Also when I bargain with clients now it's alway a negative profit compared to before. More annoying then anything

It's a fun game my only complaints are that you have to wait until your energy refills. There is no way to earn energy and you should make it so you can customize and/or upgrade your shop. Make it more exciting. Also you open the building that say they will finish construction soon because the game gets boring if there no excitement added to it.

I enjoy playing this game. Currently I have two major problems with it.  1. I wish I could change orientation based on how my phone is tilted.  2. I tried to have Mutt trade something really expensive and now it freezes every time I attempt to open the trade.

Cool. Fun. But your guys really need to fix the bugs. I would load it and keep it open doing certain things (playing a auction getting a item appraised and it would FREEZE or take absolutely forever. I would have to close the game out and re load it.
description: Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!HIGHLIGHTS💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

descriptionHTML:

An addictive thrilling game “Scrolling Ball in Sky” landing on Google Play market now. The future door opens for you from the moment you tap on the screen.
The game features:

comments: Someone needs to be fired or at least schooled on currency exchange rates. They offer 2 packs for 5 and 20 then except for rare sales which offer 49 and 79 dollar packs everything is 100 dollars google should step in and pull this game off the google play market for a square enix licensed product they have enough backing to have actual microtransactions not be a game exclusive to rich people who use 100 dollar bills as toilet paper...

I kind of enjoy the game but would like it more if there were cheaper options to buying. After you buy some the prices jump to 99.99 and have yet to see cheaper prices. I'm not unloading that in one go. The people of this game would probably make more money if they bring cheaper prices. I would buy several different little packs that eventually add up to 100 bit you ain't getting nothing otherwise. Also wish you could buy more things with the gold you purchased. Like have a choice to spend loyalty or gold

Please understand that there is really nothing free about this game except the install. While the gameplay WAS very promising at first, purchaseable bonus packs take any strategy completely out of the game. Now, in addition, each new element of the game that has been released in recent weeks requires cash to unlock. I can only use about half of the games features now. Bummer. If you're willing to pay, have a blast with this game. Otherwise leave it alone!

I started this game when it first came out. There were hardly any game advantages and everyone was having fun and on the same playing field. As more and more packages got released into the game it became a pay to win situation. I personally do not think spending $100+ on a phone game is a wise investment. Thus I enjoyed the game by taking advantage of their events and the prizes within the game. However, it has become dominated by people who payed to be the big guy and the little people get absolutely demolished. It has taken the fun out of playing, which really dissapoints me as it was a fun game to play.

This game has potential to be fun but it's completely ruined because IT'S COMPLETELY PAY-TO-WIN which sucked the fun out of the game that I quit. Don't get me wrong, Final Fantasy is highly respected RPG franchise because it's full of great games in the series. But no this one.  However, I might come back if the game developers make it not as pay-to-win as it is now. Right now, it's a complete money bucket!

This game is great and fun, I love spending my time playing this game. One problem though, what is going on with the packages? Why is it every time a package is bought all the packages go from 20 to 100 dollars ? We should be able to buy the 20 dollar packages more than once! Is that fixable? Please cuz i do want to keep playing but 100 dollars is too much.

description: Scale is a free and an addictive arcade game with an unique gameplay containing slicer and balls.Truly a brain teaser and Its super fun!How to play?Its easy, all you have to do is to cut and shrink the board by placing the slicers.You need to be strategic to scale the board wisely and watch out for the ball!If you touch the balls before your cut is complete, you lose a life.Increase your score, get diamonds, check the leaderboard and compete your friends.Try this fun game now! Best arcade game ever, how far can you go?
descriptionHTML:
Scale is a free and an addictive arcade game with an unique gameplay containing slicer and balls.

Truly a brain teaser and Its super fun!


How to play?


Its easy, all you have to do is to cut and shrink the board by placing the slicers.

You need to be strategic to scale the board wisely and watch out for the ball!

If you touch the balls before your cut is complete, you lose a life.


Increase your score, get diamonds, check the leaderboard and compete your friends.

Try this fun game now!

Best arcade game ever, how far can you go?

descriptionHTML:
MovieStarPlanet is the coolest social network & game for kids!

Attention boys and girls! Are you looking for stardom?
Then welcome to our planet filled with stars.
Create a Movie Star today and make awesome Movies, ArtBooks, photos, design clothes and share them with your friends and fans. You might become a famous celebrity overnight.
Let your creativity loose!
Become the best fashion designer and design your own clothes, play Dress Up and model your creations. Create the most amazing art of all time to earn Fame, get awards and rise to stardom.
There is tons of fun waiting for you on MovieStarPlanet! We are a family-oriented game that takes safety SERIOUSLY, and we always work to ensure MovieStarPlanet is a place where parents can trust their kids to hang out.

Visit our Help Center https://moviestarplanet.zendesk.com/hc/

Here's a taste of the fun and cool things you can do on MovieStarPlanet:
- Create an Avatar doll of yourself to show off your awesome designs
- Make new FRIENDS and CHAT in cool chatrooms
- Decorate your own Room
- Take care of your own pet & Boonies
- Create Looks, Fashion, ArtBooks & Movies using animations and crazy stickers

- Watch YouTube Videos of your favorite shows and celebrities

What are you waiting for? Download the MovieStarPlanet mobile app for your phone and tablet.
Join the fun online!

See more at moviestarplanet.com – the number one site for fame, fortune, fun & friends!

comments: I Love Gardenscapes and It Is Fun Way to Be Creative.  A Recent Update has Made it Definitely Better.  The Support Team Has Been Exceptional With Quick Responses and Answers!  There is Room for Improvement in the Amount of Coins Obtained in Completing Tasks, as Well as Eliminating Repetitious Tasks Requiring More Moves.

Should make the money in higher value as it is very hard to accumulate.  Poor marks because it takes so much of your hard earned levels and drops you down the ranks if you don't solve immediately.  I was at ruby level and have so many points taken away now I am back to silver....uninstalling thanks for nothing.

I really enjoy this game, its quite addictive but i find it very satisfying. The only problem with it is that once you get into higher levels (i'm at 300) you start needing tons of stars for small things and for instance to get rid of one stump takes like 8 stars. Anyway I like the game and am going to keep playing it.

I use the love this game and have played it for months, but the lasted update ruined it for me. Every time you don't finish a level it asked you a second time if your sure to want to lose this or  that. I don't apreciate the guilt trip to try and get money out of me. It's dispicable and unethical!

If I could give it 0 stars I would. There is no way to contact support and you can't restart the game. I got a bad download and now I'm stuck with it. My personal information should not be part of playing a match 3 game anyhow. Game crashes at least once a day and my controls only work about 60% of the time. Horrible experience! Playrix should be ashamed of their programming here.

The game is awfully hard for what is essentially a match 3 game. For a game that is supposed to be as much about the storyline as it is about the matching, it sure doesn't want you to advance that storyline. It's more about the very obvious money grab than it is about game play. Do yourself a favor and don't waste the space downloading this game. There are much more enjoyable match 3 games on Play. There's a reason it's the #3 grossing game on Google play. It's all about how much you are willing to spend, not about the actual play.
description: Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory. Embark on an adventurous journey: beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the garden, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, and enjoy the company of amusing in-game characters, including Austin, your butler, and a funny dog! What are you waiting for? Indulge yourself in some gardening and become the hero of a brand new story. Build your dream garden for free! The game features:● Addictive gameplay: swap and match, restore and decorate the garden, and be part of a breath-taking adventure all at once!● Hundreds of unique match-3 levels● Dozens of in-game characters you can make friends with● An adorable puppy who is always there to cheer you up● An in-game social network you can use to keep tabs on everything● Different areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, an old mansion, and much more● A community that comes first — be neighbors with your Facebook friends!● A super addicting game you can even play offline! Gardenscapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Enjoying Gardenscapes? Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GardenscapesInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/gardenscapes_mobile/Twitter: https://twitter.com/garden_scapes Questions? Contact our tech support at gardenscapes@playrix.com
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Gardenscapes! Rake your way through a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns to restore a wonderful garden to its former glory.

description: Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.
descriptionHTML:
Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!

Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.

Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!

However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.

- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.

- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.

- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.

- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!

- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.

Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.
developerAddress:
Llacuna 166,
Planta 10
08018 Barcelona
Spain
recentChanges: Full storage? Now you can sell dishes, ingredients and items instantly, right from your storage!

comments: Amazing game... Loved it...😍 The tunes are AWESOME!!!  And Bryan swag zone At first even I thought that But... It is a maze so it'll obviously be twisted... (No Hate) It is actually that you should click maybe after the third or fourth turn to get it right... Even I took time to understand that So it's okay 😊

Seems like controls tend to be problematic, and synchronisation has to be adjusted for every song. However the game is wonderful, precise, compelling and worth spending time on! Everything is well thought, new levels and lines are frequently added. So far my favourite app ever, looking forward to playing some new levels and the match option.

I originally had it as 5 stars, but I noticed the longer that I've had the game, the more bugs I'm starting to see. Sometimes the music won't line up with the levels, which is the point of the game, and other times the game won't register my touch and will screw up my progress. If this gets fixed that would be great, and I'd move the rating back to 5 stars!

I really wish you guys didn't update it. It truthfully bugs me that I can't listen to the full song on the menu anymore. The songs are absolutely amazing and the game is very addictive. I hope you will update the game again so that we can just sit and listen to these master pieces if we wanted. Thanks for an awesome game!

This is by far my favourite mobile game to date. Loads of fun and not covered with ads like every other game out there (while there is a few this one isn't as bad). My only complaint is the new continuation thing. That wasn't there but now it's forced me to watch ads even though I played to remove ads.

It's an amazing game. Sure I run around my bedroom screening every time I fail next to the end.... but there is something about this game that makes you happy. Is it the music? Maybe. Is it the back ground and the way it moves?possibly. It's all of those things plus more   In a nut shell I really really really really really really really really really love this game :p
description: Dancing Line combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.Game rules:Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. descriptionHTML:
Dancing Line combines fast-paced gameplay with a carefully selected soundtrack to create an experience like no other. Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. Listen to the beat and the melody, and after a short while you will find yourself doing better and better.

Come on! Test your reflexes and rhythm skills! See the surprises and wonders every level holds for you.

Game rules:
Guide an ever-growing Line through a multiple of environments, listening carefully to the music. Tap the screen to make a sharp turn, avoiding obstacles and reacting to the World changing before your eyes.

Game features:
1. Original background music
2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories
3. Very simple practice mode with only one finger tap
4. Music is the key to guide you

Support:
Are you having problems? Send email to dancingline@cmcm.com

description: Run to chase after the robber and explore the endless runner worlds of Talking Tom Gold Run! You can now go for gold in the BRAND NEW CHINESE-INSPIRED DEFAULT WORLD and race to catch the fun with loads of FREE CHARACTERS and the NEW SPECIAL CHARACTER - KUNG FU HANK! He’s an unstoppable force of fun! So what are you waiting for? Get ready to celebrate the Chinese New Year with all your favorite Talking Tom and Friends characters! Whether you’re a kid, or just young at heart, this cool game will have you running, jumping, and getting an EPIC ADRENALINE RUSH IN NO TIME AT ALL! Join billions of other Talking Tom and Friends fans and test your snowboarding skills. Rush snowboards on the snow! Rule the slopes! And have endless fun playing one of the best infinite runners out there! ★ Get a rush as you run through the new Chinese-inspired neighborhood. ★ Travel through the subway tunnel to race down the slopes and ride the halfpipe on your new snowboard – it’s super cool!!!★ Meet special guest star, Kung Fu Hank, and spend the winter with your favorite characters, Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger!GET READY, SET, RUN!! Come and have fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chase after the robber who stole your gold and unlock new worlds. Do you have what it takes to run through all the worlds and win? It’s not super easy to be the best, but we believe in you! Start running and racing now. It’s time to go for gold! Run to chase the robber – he’s got your gold! Use the gold bars you get back to build and upgrade amazing homes for Talking Tom and Friends! The finished homes will then unlock new worlds just for you! So, what are you waiting for? Let’s run for fun this winter! ★★★ENJOY THE FUN OF TALKING TOM GOLD RUN★★★- ENDLESS FUN: With endless running, racing, and snowboarding, the fun never ends!!!- MISSIONS AND REWARDS: Win missions to get cool rewards! - BUILD AMAZING HOMES: Use the gold bars you collect to build homes for Talking Tom and Friends! - UNLOCK NEW RUNNING WORLDS: Explore even more fun worlds when you upgrade your home! - RUN WITH SPECIAL CHARACTERS: Run even faster and do cool tricks with the help of special characters!PLAY FOR FREE! This app contains:- The possibility to use and connect with friends via social networks;- The option to make in-app purchases;- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (build progress, in-game functionalities, etc.);- Promotions for Outfit7’s products, as well as advertising;- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress;- Videos to watch starring Outfit7’s animated characters via YouTube integration; and- Links that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps.This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 has established COPPA-compliant privacy practices to protect the personal information of children. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: I like the mobile version better than the PC version because the touch screen works better than the mouse. I also love the food machine you can get for 12 diamonds. It's pricey but we'll worth the purchase. I kinda wish the pace of customers was a little bit slower so I had more time to prepare the food. I do wish however that I didn't need so many gems to upgrade every little thing. Or if I do need gems then maybe they could be easier to get instead of only getting 5 every time you level up. So, decrease the pace of customers and make the gems easier to get

This game is an amazing way to pass the time! I love all the upgrades and different levels, especially the events. The game gets more challenging as you go along, and the events I previoisly mentioned make it just that much better. My only complaint is how hard it is to get the special currency of the game, being diamonds. Other than that, it is a great game overall and I am looking forward to future updates.

Love this game. Easy to play. My daughter and her partner both downloaded after playing mine.  When I first downloaded the game I didn't need to have the internet on. Don't know what happened but I know have to be on the internet to start the game but can then turn the internet off. Otherwise happy with it. So many restaurants to buy. And you can get ahead with the casino and keep playing everyday to get more money and gems. Thumbs up from me.

I loved the game but after the first restaurant you need gems to upgrade things regularly and they do not come around often after the first restaurant. All the achievements are money based. Money is easy to come by and I have only won on the casino once and all the fun is lost grinding to make money to spend on the slot machine to try and get gems. I'm on the second restaurant and I'm bored of waiting for gems to upgrade now.

I Love Everything About This Game. I Can Upgrade Everything and Get Far. I Save Soooooo Much Money And I Can Learn Quickly How To Cook & Level Up Very Fast. Before I Switched Over To A New Phone Plan I Realized A Very Awesome Little Technique They Have. If You Have A Connected Account No Matter What Phone You Get Your Levels Will Be Stored & Saved. I Was So Shocked. Overall I Love This Game. Most Definitely Will Recommend.

I think it would be better if you got more gems. You can barely win anything on that little slot machine. I also noticed that you no longer get gems for every day you log in to play. Sure, the money is nice but you can't upgrade with just the money you earn while playing. I spun that slot machine 80 plus spins and barely won anything. Do the gems even pop up as a winning combo? They used to but not anymore.
description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! Features:* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients* 19 unique locations* More than 400 levels to complete* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interiorCooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress
descriptionHTML:
Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant!

Features:
* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients
* 19 unique locations
* More than 400 levels to complete
* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior

Cooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:
* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers
* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress

comments: Very addictive. Kind of misleading though. The pictures give the impression you can have large ships like the Titanic or freight carriers, but it seems to only be sailboats
Since the Feb 23rd update, the helpful "to-do list" is gone. I liked being able to work towards little quest, now the game is mostly boring and repetitive. Until it's back, I cannot give 5*.

Latest update initially froze the game, but it seems to be working now. Occasionally locks up during gameplay, but a simple exit does the trick.  One of the better games out there. No ads...yet. Doesn't force you to spend money to advance in the game.

Update today broke the game! It starts to load, then freezes when the progress bar maxes out. This is a great game and lots of fun, but you broke it with this update. Please fix asap and I'll 5 star it. Edit: game fixed. It's fun.
Latest update has killed the game. It gets stuck on the loading screen. Deleting and reinstalling and clearing data have no affect.
Well after a little while it stopped working don't recommend it unless you want to play then have to delete it cause it stopped working then perfect game to play
description: Behold, sailors! No time for relaxing on the beach! YOUR SHIP FLEET AWAITS!Do you have what it takes to develop the biggest sea transport business, manage the most powerful ship fleet and become a wealthy tycoon? Try it now! descriptionHTML:
Behold, sailors! No time for relaxing on the beach! YOUR SHIP FLEET AWAITS!

Do you have what it takes to develop the biggest sea transport business, manage the most powerful ship fleet and become a wealthy tycoon? Try it now! Get ready for an exciting journey through the history of ships! Expand your ship collection from very basic boats to the enormous warships. Build your own port and enter the world of sea & cargo trade!

NAVY FEATURES:
⚓ New content every week
⚓ Build up your port
⚓ Themed events every month
⚓ Buy real historic ships
⚓ Finish contracts from famous sailors and explorers
⚓ Trade with your friends
⚓ Explore unknown lands
⚓ Expand and manage your fleet
⚓ Sail uncharted waters and explore new lands

Start as a little fishing village, grow it into town and continue building until you become the most prosperous port city in the whole world! Embark on a sea journey through the history of ships from the age of discovery to the modern days.

COLLECT SHIPS
Relive the history of sailing by collecting real historical ships. Join the famous explorers in their adventures and finish the contracts to obtain special rewards.

DEVELOP YOUR PORT
Raise new buildings and manage the production of materials. Build a home port of the largest fleet among your friends!

EXPLORE NEW LANDS
Attracted by the unknown? Discover new destinations that expand your world. Sail the seas and trade with materials and exotic commodities.

THEMED EVENTS
Vikings, Pirates, Romans and many more. You will have chance to show the power of your fleet in the new events, starting every month. Enjoy obtaining and trading with a few special commodities, sailing to shipwrecks for amazing rewards and much more!

Do not hesitate and prepare your fleet!

comments: Ah perfect game. Fast pace not laggy smooth graphics, and playable on any devices. But i hope i can change my region like asian.. Bcoz most of the player i encounter is mexecan or spanish.. 1 more thing i hope you add a larger map i guess for team battle i think 4km x 4km is enough.. And 30mins of total playing time.. All in all fantastic game.. A two thumbs up for you guys. Keep it up

There is nothing as satisfying as sniping a person a kilometre away with a modified SCAR with a 4X scope, except for winning the match. There is a single problem though. SMG bullets do absolutely no damage with no attached scope, up to a certain distance when I put the aim mode on. Could you change that and make the damage at least 5? Other than that this game is absolutely amazing.

The best survivor royale esque game you can find on the play store. Takes up immensely less space than others like Rules of Survival. Anyone can play this, no matter the quality of their phone. It's intense solo, duo, and squad gameplay will always have you coming back to take a shot (no pun intended) at another win. An amazing feature is it's voice chat communication system. You can talk to your teammates (though unfortunately, I find most players speak Spanish. You may have more luck.) though i wish there was a text chat as well. It will hopefully come in the next update, bur I would definitely recommend getting this game. My only other suggestion is new maps, a night mode, more weapons, and attachments.

I could have given five stars. The only problem is the number of players per drop/game. Please change it to 80 to 100 range. Pretty sure youll have a lot of players and ill be glad to recommend it in my facebook page if youll be able to increase the max players. It tends to become boring when you see only 12 players left when the safe zone did not even appear yet. You will look like a rat looking for a cheese around the map. More players means more fun. If you'll take this suggestion seriously, you will thank me later.

It's a pretty solid effort at a battle royale genre it need more customization however maybe another map and just a tad smoother on the game mechanics. Also if it could hit the 100 player per match marker that would be great but I understand that the map must be smaller so it might get a little too crowded.

I love this game so much, but what about more structures? Also I wish there was a chat in game that you can just type instead of voice chat, also the number one thing I wish you guys could add in or fix is the snipers bc they are weak... also I think there should be a counter somewhere when people dismount the plane so we can Dee how much are still in plane and how much already left  That's all
description: Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.[Form guilds]Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds![Battlegrounds in its original form]Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.[Realistic and smooth graphics]Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.[Contact us]Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN
descriptionHTML:
Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.

[Form guilds]
Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds!

[Battlegrounds in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.

[Contact us]
Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN

Overall great game when they game out with the sequel it addressed the main problem with this one mainly no other maps and you have to pay to get the female character

comments: Very annoying problem with Google Play account disconnections at task swap. Fix this, and I will be able to actually play the game. Since I use my phone for making real income, I need to swap screens to other activities, and each time do a four step log in process back into the game. I have never seen this problem before in any other game, no reason this game would be different. About the game? Well, I'll tell when this problem is gone 😅

It is  great game, for ages 10 and up even 9 is okay. It is cool that we are building a town from scratch, like from the prehistoric time, and building our way up. Not like other game that start you off with big present day buildings. It doesn't cost a lot to do things like building and removing things, some object are free, they give the right amount of money and you can always win some more diamonds. In other games you would have to pay to remove object and buildings are ridiculously expensive.  It is hard to make money in other games and to make diamonds. I personally at night put my hunters too make things that take 8 hours and in the day things that take 5 to 15 minutes but sometimes 1hour. It is a very good game, it is almost as a real life city town, empire.

Boring!! Hurry up and wait. Never enough coins and forge points. Constantly waiting for buildings to make money and points. Ready made buildings. Can't build your own. Waiting, waiting, waiting. Been playing about 2 hours and already bored to death!

Although FoE is very enjoyable, it can get very complicated, especially for new players. The biggest drawback is the lack of instructions...new players, unless taken under the wing of an experienced player, have to fumble through at first, many times guessing or using trial and error to accomplish the simplest things.

At first I was a little unhappy with the amount of stuff I can do with spending diamonds, but I now find it refreshing, not to spend active hours on a game in order to receive a reward. I'm glad they reward patience.

Started playing, made some progress, then the next time I went to play it wouldn't link back to my Google account and kept saying incorrect password. You get one star because that was frustrating and I couldn't get back to the game I already made progress on. UNINSTALLED...
description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint

The official World of Peppa Pig app offers your family a safe and ad-free environment filled with lots of learning and fun! Featuring the award-winning show’s friendly characters, there are plenty of interactive games and activities for your little ones to enjoy and grow with.

Start your FREE 7-DAY TRIAL for a World of Peppa Pig subscription now to gain UNLIMITED ACCESS to all the activities, and join the fun with everyone’s favorite little piggy - snorts and giggles guaranteed! There is always something new to discover and explore every 2 weeks.
