comments: lnstaII 'VEARN' App Enterr (CRETA) to Start Earning So far so good.Fun way to get money. Won't make you rich but the extra cash is helpful. It's also the best exchange rate on points. McEarn points equals mc instead of like some of the others where it takes VEarn points to reach vc etc...Also, lnstaII 'TOYOCASH' App Enterr (TRDG) very reliable in paying you when you redeem to toyocash. You can choose assorted giftcards as payment or transfer to Walet for cash. Your choice. I love these guys thanks for addingsome fun to my day.

I love the game play and graphics. But I payed for adidas female clothing and an aquarium previously on the game, and then when I restarted, they have gone. I spend £3 on it in total and I actually spent more money on other things that didn't come back in the next game, but it's understandable because they were lifestyle points and you know it's currency not clothing or furniture. I uninstall sims sometimes a bit of always go back and before my items were there, but now they're not and that really frustrated me. I actually ended up in 2017 spending  £10 on sims freeplay and that's the only money I think I will ever spend on ot now because if you restart,  you don't get anything you wanted. Please fix this because I spent that money and I could've bought something else with it but I didn't because I like sims.

Overall,  this is a great game. Two requests.  1) Selling multiple items at once.  I bought a load of junk and I need to sell it!  2) Make the schools "playable",  like the police station. I was talking to my sister about this and it'd be cool if the schools were playable and you could build clubs inside it. Anyway,  I loved everything in the game! So fun,  so creative.

First, I don't like that the game is in realtime it makes it a lot less fun and more boring. Secondly, I don't like that you HAVE to buy things just to get vip. I know that the prices are quite low but if you're just a kid like me then that limits what you can do. Lastly, I want more jobs and maybe even school to be playable it would just seem reasonable and make the game more addicting. Overall the game is really enjoyable but could do better, still keep up the good work!

For the fact that we can't sell multiple items at once is a big downer. I have accumulated so many windows, computers, chairs etc with watching the daily news ads and it's a complete pain to delete 30, 50, 70 or even more! items one by one. Please consider adding this function in the app as it's in the real The Sims games.

This is a really nice game and I would have given it 5 stars but because I didn't use Lara Craft to help with the wedding (my sims worked day and night to make those items) but I still did not make it. It's hard to get social points and since I do not have a credit account I could not buy social points. I'm really disappointed because I wanted the wedding to happen 😢

recentChanges: Tropical love is in the air in the latest update, where you can:
• Take part in the Love & Treasure Discovery Quest
• Design your own tropical getaway with a “treasured” island
• Unlock an exotic beach bungalow house template
• Play cupid with flirty animations like splashing in the sea, sun-lounging with coconut drinks, and more!
Plus, the ever-popular Wedding Belles Live Event is back. Love and treasure The Sims FreePlay!

description: Radioapans kojträd är en app för barn från Sveriges RadioRadioapan är Barnradions blåa maskot och en riktigt apig kompis. Han bor i en trädkoja i Sagoskogen och älskar radio och ljud.I Radioapans träd kan du:- Lyssna på sagor och sånger från Barnradion- Inreda Radioapans koja med Emmot- Plocka bananer med Radioapans flygande matta (ny!)- Mata fåglar med Ljudmonstret- Lysa med ficklampa och hitta gömda saker (ny!)- Upptäcka alla djur runt om i trädet”Radioapans kojträd” är anpassad för de yngsta barnen, 2-7 år, med mycket ljud och animation. Även den som inte kan läsa kan leka och ha kul med Radioapan. Appen passar också bra att använda tillsammans.Appen är framtagen i samarbete med barn och noga testad så att den både ska vara rolig och lätt att använda. Fokus ligger på att kunna lyssna på barnradio i en mysig miljö och leka tillsammans med Radioapan och hans vänner.Radioapans värld med sin vänliga stämning och färgglada grafik är välkänd för många barn och föräldrar. I appen ”Radioapans banankalas” och på Radioapans webbplats hos Sveriges Radio kan du höra fler program från Barnradion och leka och spela mer med Radioapan. Alla Barnradions program finns också i appen Sveriges Radio Play.”Radioapans kojträd” är gratis och det finns inga köp inne i appen (inga in app purchases). När du laddat hem sagorna och sångerna finns de i appen och du behöver inte ha uppkoppling för att lyssna.Hemligt välkommen till Radioapans kojträd!Om Sveriges Radio:Sveriges Radio är den reklamfria och oberoende radion i allmänhetens tjänst.Version 2.0 © Copyright Sveriges RadioNotera:Appar som är spelliknande kräver ofta telefoner och surfplattor med snabb processor och ordentligt med minne. Det gäller även för "Radioapans kojträd". Det här är vad vi rekommenderar för att appen ska fungera bra: - Telefon eller surfplatta med Android 4.1 och uppåt. - Telefon eller surfplatta med snabb processor och ordentligt med minne. Om du har en telefon med långsammare processor eller lite minne blir också appen långsammare.
descriptionHTML:
Radioapans kojträd är en app för barn från Sveriges Radio

Radioapan är Barnradions blåa maskot och en riktigt apig kompis. Han bor i en trädkoja i Sagoskogen och älskar radio och ljud.

I Radioapans träd kan du:
- Lyssna på sagor och sånger från Barnradion
- Inreda Radioapans koja med Emmot
- Plocka bananer med Radioapans flygande matta (ny!)
- Mata fåglar med Ljudmonstret
- Lysa med ficklampa och hitta gömda saker (ny!)
- Upptäcka alla djur runt om i trädet

”Radioapans kojträd” är anpassad för de yngsta barnen, 2-7 år, med mycket ljud och animation. Även den som inte kan läsa kan leka och ha kul med Radioapan. Appen passar också bra att använda tillsammans.

Appen är framtagen i samarbete med barn och noga testad så att den både ska vara rolig och lätt att använda. Fokus ligger på att kunna lyssna på barnradio i en mysig miljö och leka tillsammans med Radioapan och hans vänner.

Radioapans värld med sin vänliga stämning och färgglada grafik är välkänd för många barn och föräldrar. I appen ”Radioapans banankalas” och på Radioapans webbplats hos Sveriges Radio kan du höra fler program från Barnradion och leka och spela mer med Radioapan. Alla Barnradions program finns också i appen Sveriges Radio Play.

”Radioapans kojträd” är gratis och det finns inga köp inne i appen (inga in app purchases). När du laddat hem sagorna och sångerna finns de i appen och du behöver inte ha uppkoppling för att lyssna.

Hemligt välkommen till Radioapans kojträd!

Om Sveriges Radio:
Sveriges Radio är den reklamfria och oberoende radion i allmänhetens tjänst.

Version 2.0 © Copyright Sveriges Radio

Notera:
Appar som är spelliknande kräver ofta telefoner och surfplattor med snabb processor och ordentligt med minne. Det gäller även för "Radioapans kojträd". Det här är vad vi rekommenderar för att appen ska fungera bra:

- Telefon eller surfplatta med Android 4.1 och uppåt.
- Telefon eller surfplatta med snabb processor och ordentligt med minne.

Om du har en telefon med långsammare processor eller lite minne blir också appen långsammare.
recentChanges: Hej halloj!
I denna release finns en ny länk på föräldrarsidan till vår integritetspolicy på Sveriges Radio.
/Ap(p)teamet, Sveriges Radio
summary: Join Radio Monkey and his friends in kojträdet!
title: Radioapans kojträd

Glow Hockey delivers a new style of hockey game. Easy to play, hard to master. Challenge yourself with the computer opponents!

FEATURES:

+ 2 themes.
+ Colorful glow graphics.
+ Smooth and responsive game play.

description: FIFA Mobile has been reimagined to bring you the most authentic and exciting mobile soccer game you’ll ever experience! Get a free Cristiano Ronaldo item to start building and managing your team. Train any player to superstar status, attack opponents, and keep coming back for daily content all season long. Plus, get into the game on the go with a download size of under 100 MB. Whether you’re a savvy veteran or just starting out on the pitch, FIFA Mobile is your source for soccer.BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM™Develop the most competitive squad when you choose any 11 players from over 550 real teams, including stars from past and present, and train them to over 100 OVR. Add depth to your roster, manage your lineup on the fly, and quickly tweak tactics before every match. Make the right calls and watch your club become the Ultimate Team. ATTACK TO WINTake on thrilling matches that drop you into your offensive possessions with VS Attack mode. This innovative level of competition kicks your game into high gear while you strive to dominate 90-second matches, climb the leaderboards, and earn seasonal rewards year-round. KEEP UP WITH REAL-WORLD EVENTSStay connected to real-world soccer as it happens across the globe. Test your skills in single-player Campaign mode, then challenge yourself with uniquely themed Events where you can earn incredible prizes.JOIN A LEAGUE, CONQUER THE WORLDParticipate in Leagues, a truly social experience that allows you to join forces and strive for glory with friends and gamers around the globe. Test your skills in inter-league championships, or take on the best gamers worldwide in League vs. League Tournaments to climb the leaderboards and prove your talent on the pitch.This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Game Center/Google Play Game Services. Log out of Game Center/Google Play Game Services before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.User Agreement: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/enVisit http://help.ea.com/en/# for assistance or inquiries.EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on ea.com/service-updates.

comments: Nice game with very good events but the drop rates to heroes of 5 star is too low i killed a lot of gems and scrols and hero orbs and my first 5 star i  dropped it at lvl 75. Okok now again event of summoning 100 scrolls and i continue still no 5 star hero only 4, just try and fix the drop rate. In the rest its a nice game.

I purchased the spring festival card on top of all the money I've already dumped into this game and the devs didn't give me my in game rewards. I've submitted numerous tickets to get a refund or my rewards and they just reply there is no problem. Ya no problem with you taking my money.  They deleted my review, wonder how many other people had this issue and had reviews deleted.

Wasn't sure about this game at first. I love it. I use a f2p  and a vip one  to see  the difference  between the two. Really well done. Having said all that the game does require patience. This is an IDLE game. You pick it up do dailies, talk, spend money, or what ever you want to do in game, then put it down to "farm gold,xp,mats". The high end heros do take some planning to aquire as a f2p player. This game requires patience because it's an IDLE game. Yes some people have a ton of money to throw at the game but don't be jealous, just play your game and have fun.

Not what I expected, given that my first impression of it was of IH being an "annoying add". Once I decided to pick it up though my thoughts changed rather drastically.   It's simple, it's fun and the warm colour palette of the graphics make a nice change compared to the widespread use of bleak colours in other games.   If you think you might enjoy this game, you sure are my friend.

Too much pay to win, free players hardly getting anywhere in the events and so fourth, not fair, increase the rewards of spending money and give free players more too easily solved, I previously rated it 5 stars instantly loved it but as I've progressed it's just not fair!! Please do something!! I am vip6 but I'm not rich, please bring more rewards for loyal free users who watch the ads and everything!! Thank you!!

One of the worse cash grabs I have ever seen.  Love the game, but you literally need hundreds of dollars to do any single event and get a decent reward.  Go look at the latest event on their Facebook page.  The reviews are awful, ands it veteran and new players alike.  Game is fun, but they need to cut costs by half to make it worth while.

comments: Ok, so I will be calm in this review. Whenever I have the same car in a battle with red, we ram each other, but they push me off the map with ease. The main reason why I wrote a review for this game is that you should make the alien levels a little easier. The last level for it is way too hard, you can barely aim at the boss. The controls are hard too. Also can you optimize the game for the Samsung Galaxy tab A?

I would have given this game a higher review than three that I have given it, the problem is that I have noticed a problem when trying to save some money. For me at least when trying to save money through the daily giveaway/present of playing the game everyday it has stolen money from me discreetly whenever I get around the 1000 coin mark sometimes it is one hundred sometimes I have lost 400 with no explanation as to where the money is. It is for this reason that I have lowered my rating. (Besides the disappearing money I enjoyed the game.)

This game is pretty good, for the most part. The only problem is the bots you go upagainst are  way to hard. I can never win. I would have gave them 5 stars but I gave them 4 stars because of the bots. And the game is kinda hard to control. When I move backwords on a veichel it goes up.

Good for killing time. Some of the computer driven opponents seem to have a very decisive advantage at initial start of certain stages, and some of the smaller vehicles are too sensitive on the controls  but overall decent game.
New update stucks a lot and 1st time my mobile hangs a lot due to this game and btry drains faster than ever. plz crt these mistakes to continue njoying this game
Great game, would just love if replays were available to more phones, mine isn't able to do replays yet. Just wondering if it might be coming soon. I've got a Pixel 2.
description: Drive Ahead! is a gladiator car fight. Wreck your friends by knocking their helmets with a variety of cars from monster trucks to alien saucers! Hundreds of cars and levels bring endless hours of helmet-crashing action and freak accidents!You can play Drive Ahead! in four game modes. Battle your friends in two-player matches in local multiplayer on the same device or over WiFi! Explore stadium missions featuring dinosaurs, aliens and robots! Reduce the unworthy to wrecks and reign supreme in King of the Hill! Share your best Superstar Stadium replays for a shot at featuring inside the game! Will you be the next Drive Ahead superstar?!Customize your battles or go random for crazy matchups! Can you best a monster truck with a go-kart? Hiding won't help - sudden death brings sawblades, rain of fire and flash floods. The only defense is ruthless offense!Collect virtual credits and use them in the Prize Machine to unlock tons of cars and loads of arenas as you play!We would love to hear your feedback. comments: Love the detail of going down to nut and bolts practically to do repairs. Two bones of contention:  The timer to access new barns is too long, does not make for satisfying game play. Also, after purchasing a tool upgrade, I was pleased to see a longer list of repairs gained. Great. Except I couldn't remove the fuel pump to remove the fuel tank. It said my tools needed upgrading for that one part. Please fix that bug so all repairs needed can be made with tool set level.

It's a good game with room for improvement, I've leveled up my tools to level 4 but it's so annoying when it says tools need to be upgraded, this need to be  improved. All so when you fix a vehicle the money could be upped a bit more. I know you can re-paint the vehicle but I wish you could improve the wheels and the interior of the vehicle to make some more money. The other thing that the other paint uses coins how about instead or all so to pay for the other paint with the in game money.

Well let's see ..played the game fixed 7 cars and I made about $70,000 on the game I bought another car and had to replace just about all the parts on it I bought all the parts and was in the process of putting all the parts on it and in the middle of that ,the game shut down on me I opened it back up to continue playing and it had started back over from the beginning at the tutorial and I lost all progress. y'all need to fix this. until this is fixed and or I am put back where I was on the game then I would not recommend downloading this game or any of the other mechanic games for 2018, much less even playing it. it's a waste of time and data also had a trouble with the other 2018 version mechanic game you will see a posting on that one where it's not giving enough time to fix panels and it's not registering clicking on panels to find out if anything's messed up on them .thanks for the problems and the issues. This game is on this phone of mine and the other game is on my other phone developers. You'll see a post on the other garage mechanic 2018 game by Wesley wright. Yaw need to fix these issues ok , because these bad ratings I have been seeing by others isn't looking good for you games.

Game is great but I would've loved some more features or more cars it gets repetitive real fast please add more features like OBD SCAN or inside car customizations also pc version you can change rims and wheels lights bumpers and add more cars not saying you should add all that but maybe some if possible to make it less repetitive
"Breaks" is misspelled, and the photo button is in German or something. Cool game, can really help someone learn how a car works.
Hi, I think this game is great, but it has a problem. Whenever I try to scroll on the menus all the items in the menu dissappear.  Would you please see what you can do to fix this?

comments: I rather enjoy the game a lot. It feels balanced for the most part,  leveling takes a while which wouldn't be a issue if it didn't take so long to go place to place. Gets sort of annoying to go back and forth trying to get resources and the game goes from fun to grindy quickly.   My main issue is the battery life of my phone. While charging my phone and playing this game but battery was being drained.  Graphics are good, I enjoy the crafting and base building, the combat is nice, and the auto harvest feature is a life saver.

**UPDATE** Is an awesome game. Could use a few more perks (ie. Weapons and hard to get items) in drop boxes and yellow zones.Now the down side is if you die in a level your last position is no longer there to try and recoup some of your items. Players killing you as you open trunks in inventory. Oh ya and the free spin box...give random prizes instead of coins and rope. People will get really into it if perks are awesome. Great game could be the best with a couple tweaks. Awesome job.

Just another game that either makes you wait to play it, or pay not to wait. Why? Don't make me pay not to wait. Entice me to pay with cool things, otherwise it's an instant uninstall. Poor business model. Imagine paying double to get them to make your food faster at a restaurant, or just wait a long time. Would you really keep going there, or somewhere else that makes something just as good but in a reasonable amount of time?

Anyway i edit this review... The is nice and graphics are cool. But there is the problem on the game. Could you pls remove the energy bar so i can still play the without waiting to fill the energy bar... Cause otherwise i less play this game in days... that you know you must wait your energy bar to fill again in a couple of minutes if the energy is gone?. Pls Remove it so we can play all day along.. Thank you.

This game truly amazing with beautiful graphics, decent yet easy controls, a large amunt of items and okay customization. The only reason i give this a 4 star rating is because one thing. The hoard mechanic. I mean it's a good concept. The only problem is that there's a hoard every 24 hours. And since wood is kinda pain to get it sucks to come back after work to come to a destroyed house. If it was like every month or heck even every week that would be fine just please give more time than 24 hours for a hoard

Not happy at the moment after the latest updates... No point of spending any cash seeing that you went from getting a loot box to only getting one item at a time... Some parts are still impossible to come by even clearing the infected forest. Hope the next update will be more worthwhile. Apart from that still a good game. Keep it up

comments: This game is mind blowing. The art style is great the animations and the crafting. However u can improve this great game. 1: It would be better if u could tell us what each material is and what can it be used for by adding an information section. Add more building materials. U can add a fence so that we can guard our house and more weapons and types of arrows (🔥 fire arrows, bomb arrows) something like that and more clothing. Also add multiplayer (cuz it would be fun).Overall this is the hands down best survival game on mobile. TBH I thought this game would be a dark souls on mobile but no it's better than that.

I love the game, the crafting system is awesome, the gameplay is great. However, there are some points that I suggest  1. Nerf the Damned, also the Lepers, they are strong for beginners. Club can't beat them easily 2. Make another way to find leek seeds 3. Lepers can detect you sneaking to them, and they spawn out of nowhere. I don't know if it is a bug or not. 4. Cooking meat uses too much wood.  I look forward for more updates. It's a great game to be honest.

It's a good attempt but too easy to die. No water. Seriously? I have an empty bottle yet nothing to put in it. I would like the chance to explore and build BEFORE I die five times and can't reclaim the stuff I've spent time collecting.  If these things are remedied I'll try again. Till then, deleting.

Honestly it's a great game and lots of fun but that energy mechanic needs to change. I know you can walk but it's still such a strange thing to gate your players out of playing.  Maybe if you could always travel at the same speed but if you didn't spend energy you could be attacked randomly while you travel. Or if energy was used to speed up crafting. I dunno but it's the only thing holding me back from a perfect score.

This game is awesome but here are the things like really want in the next game. 1. I need to disconnect with Google play to delete my old saved progress full of mistakes. Please add this feature. 2. Zombies are too hard to beat . Please decrease some of their capabilities. 3. There must be an increase in chest slots . 4. Please decrease the quantity of wood logs to cook. Otherwise all of our hardworking to gather logs while be replaced by only a few meats and others. 6. Please add another source of getting seeds. They are too hard to get.

Very good idea but lack of some stuff like improvements. Right now the demolition system not work and we cannot move the walls or floors. The energy should be more sustainable and will be good if the trees on the base and some stuff randomly spawn. I will drop the game for now and on the future i Will give another shoot
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!● EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.● LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.● DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!● SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.● OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.● BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.● JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.● RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.● SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.

comments: Tokens take too long to refill. Level up gives a few coins, why not a token refill? Tournament champion gets 4 tokens. 7 tokens for a day? Cheapskates! When do you want us to play, every 5 days? So cheap in giving prizes, guessing you want us to buy eh? I'll give myself a few weeks playing this game and am out. No daily prize wheel, just a daily "less than 20 coins" reward. Sooooooo cheap!

It's just ok.  Hard to see your entire hand at times and some of the rules are different than the actual UNO game itself. When I contacted this apps tech support, they sounded as if they could care less and said they will not be making any changes to the game.  So I play until they want me to buy credits then I stop.  When they give me more free credits I play again.  I like the game UNO, just not this one so much.  Why do I still play?  Hmmm, that's a good question.

Greatest game ever~~¤mean it.  The Updated game even better.  Need to be easier to play with Friends that you JUST made ~~maybe REPLAY!!!  😬 😲 😠 😐 😭  Friends where are you? Great for tablets.   I am UNO happy . Happy New years  .Oh don't terminate the game unless you just have to, I well try finding something other to do. Nothing Good ever lasts anyway.   Thanks for reading.  UNO POWER.

Classic UNO with a couple of modern twists and turns. I have never spent any real money in a game and I don't ever plan to, but here you also don't really need to. I've won many tournaments and got really far in the game without buying anything. You get extra coins by winning and completing daily tasks, as well as watching ads. But you're not forced to watch them. It's not just about luck. You have to play smart to win, just like any other card game. I love it.

Great game in the graphics department however, I agree with other consumers when they say the special abilities you can obtain by playing this game ruins it. Simple is best and this uno app is anything but. Sometimes when I log in, the tokens don't even recharge overnight and I have to wait a few more hours before I play three free rounds of uno before you have to pay for more tokens. Very hit and miss app.

Okay, this is actually a decent game HOWEVER unless you buy your way through its almost impossible to win tournaments.  They shouldn't be putting people in the "club" and level 100+ with people who are like level 10 and not in this "club" it makes it almost impossible for them to win unless they're INSANELY lucky.  People with cheats can turn you from being at uno and winning, to being in last place in seconds and it honestly just kills the enjoyment of the game

comments: I'm totally addicted to this game! great graphics and lots of fun games that really make you think.  I just wish that it used up lives rather than credits because the credits can run out so fast and take a while to build the pot up again unless you want to pay £

It's a really fun and addictive game with one major flaw. After you start getting to the harder levels, you might as well quit and find a new game unless you only want to play one or two rounds an hour or pay to play. Every level costs coins to play and if you fail a level you are out pretty much your whole hourly allotment of coins. Winning a round doesn't make up for even one loss either. Love the game,  but really annoyed that I can't actually play it consistently enough to truly enjoy it.
Like it but costs too much to play. Can only play a short time before I run out of points. To bad because great graphics.

The only thing I do not like about Grand Harvest Solitaire is not being able to earn more coins to play longer. Games cost 2000 coins to play and you don't win much more than 2000 so you're always relying on harvests for coin & unable to play until you build your coins back up by harvesting every hour...
I'm addicted to this game!   You must think about your moves although you are not in total control.  Love the Harvesting of $$$ too.
I am totally addicted with this game. I used to play other games daily but not any more. I just want to play this game.

comments: On mobile, the ball often ends up too close to the corners for you to aim or see any trajectory. It clearly needs bigger margins, or you have to see lots of balls wasted. Apart from that, might be a fun game

Overall the game is great and super addictive. I probably would have continued to play but the sheer number of advertisements and some coding logic that makes it annoying after every game to wait for the ad to go and to even after selecting the Google account, it keeps asking for that... It's become annoying beyond the point for me to continue. Otherwise, great game.

A geometry based game with messed up geometry, especially interaction with corners. Add the fact that block addition on each level is set up to fail you - 'it's ok' is a pretty accurate overall experience
An addictive game! Frustrating maybe at first but once into it it difficult to stop playing 👍
Too much ads for such a simple game. Lacking of functions which differentiate itself from many other same games, but require to watch several more ads.
Too many adds and the fact that you can't see the different patterns of the balls you unlock is somewhat annoying, still is a ok game to waste your time with.

descriptionHTML:
Shoot the ball. Break the brick. Super simple. Instantly fun.

Start with one ball and take the endless adventure. The ball can bounce to damage many bricks and reduce their health. Collect all the balls in your way by shooting circles that balls are in. The more ball, the more power. Do not let brick defeat you. Break all bricks to get a pass. Prove your strength in the top of champions.

Features:
★ Free to play
★ Endless, relaxed gameplay, perfect time killer
★ No wifi, no problem, you can play offline anywhere, anytime
★ Easy to play, simple rule, play by one hand, easy to aim at anywhere on screen
★ Score competition with friends and all players all over the world

How To Play:
* Swipe your finger down to shoot bricks and reduce their durability to zero
* Aim carefully to get right angle
* Try to break as many bricks as possible
* Shoot the white circle to increase the number of balls
* You can make infinity ball chain.
* Each round more powerful bricks will come
* Just one brick fall to ground. You Die!

comments: (REAL REVIEW! NOT A PAID REVIEWER) Really enjoying the game. It's a good time killer. Some levels are a lot of fun and actually require a little bit of skill. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is there are way too many ads. It will randomly make you watch a video to upgrade your ride or character, and/or to play a level. There's been a few times where I had enough tickets to play, and coins to upgrade my character the two points recommended, and I had to watch a video for all three. Three ads before you can even play a level is ridiculous. I understand that it's a big part of making money for the developers, but I've never had a free game with this many ads. Get rid of some of the ads and I'll gladly update my review to 5 stars.
Nice game I love it.it give me energy to play every day .Ilike it so much I never stop playing this game because it simple .This game is relax able when you got a stress
It keeps glitching. And it flips over when i'm not doing it. But sometimes the glitching is good
Awesome game but controls would be better instead of button to tilt, tilt your phone
Great game. Love it you should definitely download it.😎😎😅😅😎
I love it and it is easy and hard but great to
description:
* NOW WITH MULTIPLAYER MODE! *Get ready for some extreme waterslide action in the world’s craziest water park simulator! Survive as long as you can as you perform crazy stunts and blast through everything in your path! Whizz and bounce through rollercoaster-style corkscrews, loops and more! You’ll brave incredible water parks and dominate some seriously insane tracks. This is more than just fun in the sun…Have you got the skills to make it to the finish line in this epic, thrill-filled ride?
TAKE IT TO THE MAXTake the fun to another level when you choose from tons of rad “rides” like bathtubs, sharks, or jet skis, each with their own unique specs. The new multiplayer mode allows you to challenge friends and other uphill rush enthusiasts. Set up races, beat record, collect diamonds to unlock cool upgrades, and use power-ups to give you a boost!
RIDE YOUR WAY IN THE LEVEL EDITORCreate your own levels that can be played by your friends and other players from around the world. They will rate your levels and help you climb to the top of the leaderboard. Of course you can just play other players’ levels too, tons of new ones will be added daily!
SUPER FUN FEATURES:• Amazing new cruise ship world!• Conquer the world’s most dangerous attractions • Experience extreme water park thrills• Perform mind-blowing stunts • Choose from 20+ rides and many different characters and outfits• Master all levels in Level Mode• Survive as long as you can in Endless Mode• Create your own content in the Level Editor• Tons of new levels added every day by the community• Discover hidden diamonds and unlock power-ups• Conquer the global leaderboard• Play anytime, anywhere, no wi-fi needed!
Will you wipe out or will you prove yourself as a water park pro? Jump in now and find out!

description: Lek och lär med Tripp, Trapp, Träd!Utforska, upplev och skapa tillsammans med UR:s språkstärkande och begreppsutvecklande app för förskolebarn och pedagoger. Här möter du ekollonen Tripp och Trapp som bor i det stora trädet Träd.I APPEN KAN NI- Utforska världen kring Träd både dag och natt, och leka med ekollonen Tripp och Trapp.- Sjunga, spela, dansa och programmera ljudslingor med koltrasten Kol-Erik, hermelinen Härm-Elin och Elke Ekorre i fågelholken.- Skapa med ljud, bilder och begrepp i pekboken.- Projicera interaktiva mönster och miljöer som skapar förundran och inspirerar till lek.- Titta och lyssna på sagor, sånger och på andra barn som berättar om sin vardag.- Skapa stora och små magiska kryp tillsammans.OM TRIPP, TRAPP, TRÄDTripp, Trapp, Träd är en lekfull värld med funktioner som är språkutvecklande och begreppsstärkande. Tripp, Trapp, Träd ska väcka nyfikenhet och inspirera till lärande lek i och utanför appen och lägga grund för samtal och interaktion mellan barn, samt mellan barn och pedagoger.Tripp, Trapp, Träd ingår i UR:s större satsning mot förskolan som också innefattar pedagogiska magasin som sänds i radio och tv och som finns tillgängliga på UR:s webbplats. I arbetet med att ta fram appen har UR tagit hjälp av förskolebarn och pedagoger, samt forskare och sakkunniga inom området.OM URSveriges Utbildningsradio AB (UR) är en del av public service med fokus på att stärka kunskap och bildning. UR:s program utgår från användarnas behov och finns fritt tillgängliga på webben under lång tid. På så vis utgör UR en kunskapsbank som bidrar till ett livslångt lärande.
descriptionHTML:

Utforska, upplev och skapa tillsammans med UR:s språkstärkande och begreppsutvecklande app för förskolebarn och pedagoger. Här möter du ekollonen Tripp och Trapp som bor i det stora trädet Träd.

I APPEN KAN NI
- Utforska världen kring Träd både dag och natt, och leka med ekollonen Tripp och Trapp.
- Sjunga, spela, dansa och programmera ljudslingor med koltrasten Kol-Erik, hermelinen Härm-Elin och Elke Ekorre i fågelholken.
- Skapa med ljud, bilder och begrepp i pekboken.
- Projicera interaktiva mönster och miljöer som skapar förundran och inspirerar till lek.
- Titta och lyssna på sagor, sånger och på andra barn som berättar om sin vardag.
- Skapa stora och små magiska kryp tillsammans.

OM TRIPP, TRAPP, TRÄD
Tripp, Trapp, Träd är en lekfull värld med funktioner som är språkutvecklande och begreppsstärkande. Tripp, Trapp, Träd ska väcka nyfikenhet och inspirera till lärande lek i och utanför appen och lägga grund för samtal och interaktion mellan barn, samt mellan barn och pedagoger.

Tripp, Trapp, Träd ingår i UR:s större satsning mot förskolan som också innefattar pedagogiska magasin som sänds i radio och tv och som finns tillgängliga på UR:s webbplats. I arbetet med att ta fram appen har UR tagit hjälp av förskolebarn och pedagoger, samt forskare och sakkunniga inom området.

OM UR
Sveriges Utbildningsradio AB (UR) är en del av public service med fokus på att stärka kunskap och bildning. UR:s program utgår från användarnas behov och finns fritt tillgängliga på webben under lång tid. På så vis utgör UR en kunskapsbank som bidrar till ett livslångt lärande.
recentChanges: Bug fixar och optimeringar.
summary: Explore, create, play and learn along with the acorns and the Tripp Trapp.
title: Tripp, Trapp, Träd

comments: GAH! They've over complicated this game with unnecessary graphics and gifts and prizes etc. I couldn't even figure out how to get into the levels for a while haha. I'm sure if I had the patience to go through and understand it properly it would be fine, but I didn't want to. Old angry birds setup was better. Wish you didn't change it. Uninstalled after 1 day.

I really think the tower is rigged. 1 in 4 chance of getting the pig but it seems to happen ALL the time. Cant get past the 6th or 7th floor. However if you spend lots o money to buy gems I guess it can be done. Not for me I am out.

Can no longer watch ads to get an extra rewards chest plus, I logged in for 90 days and did not get my legendary chest. My screen froze up when I hit the claim button and had to restart my game. Now my chest is gone and the next level has appeared without me being able to chose what I wanted from the chest.

Caution! Needed access to my personal files including photos to play the game.  I denied and could not start the game unless it had access. Uninstalling after this review.  Don't let programmers and hackers get a hold of your personal files!

Graphics are good, game play can be lame at times when you get birds that are incapable of completing the level. You can't buy the game and that bothers me. I spent $20, (to support the effort) but am trying to keep it at that.  Others have spent $100 and more. Greed ruins this game. Just finished a level that was designed to be beat only by spending money. Spent hours trying but finally paid and beat it. The game play is not consistent. If you have a bad day it will let you win, if you're winning, suddenly an opponent that should never be able to beat you, kicks your ass when you've played perfectly.

It won't let me watch videos. Every time I click on the TV to watch a video for a free bird or arena ticket, it restart the game instead and I lose a life. I hope this gets fixed because other then that it's an addictive game. When the Glitch is fixed I will give a better rating.

Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!
You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.

Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!

DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!
There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.

comments: It remains a classic, yet some parts are just too screwed up. After paying to remove the ads, the ad hoes with the play button still show up. The vase breaker was my favourite in the past. Now it is broken. 65% of the time ir reads actap like a double tap making it utterly unplayable

It was good but then this happened. I was playing just like any other day. My phone had died while I was playing, so I charged it and left it untouched for about an hour or two. When I signed in, all off my progress was erased! Please respond and tell me what happened.

The game was great than EA got to it with there sticky fingers and put adds everywhere, it isn't the same game I enjoyed ages ago. It's just another add infested game now, even if you do pay for it l. The charm is gone

Irritating. At first it gives you an option of playing a video to receive additional help. Which works only for the first time. Next time onwards no way to cancel the video in case you don't want to install it. It is so frustrating. Either allows to cancel or tell the users what to do next. Worst way of promoting other apps.

Never ever close this app unless you want to lose all your progress, all your achievements, and everything you bought from Crazy Dave - including what you bought with real money. You can back out of it, but when you "close all apps" to clear your phone's memory, it clears ALL memory for this game. Makes the seemingly reasonable cost of game coins a complete rip-off. And achievements a complete waste of time.
Why ask people to pay to have ads removed and still have so many features that you need to watch ads for? It just seems like a rip off to me very disappointed in this purchase

description: Beep, beep! Alfie Atkins and his friends are waiting for you to visit them in their wonderous world. Together with Alfie, you will build a clean world and recycle different materials to build roads, houses, stores, schools, parks and much much more. As the community grows, you and Alfie will help the citiziens with fun things/activities in the city. You will be able to recharge your electric car, shop in the store, go to the doctor's, pick fruit, rake leaves, and stop fires with fire hose. In return you will receive lots of love from the citizens and generous rewards to continue your important work. This is a game featuring many hours of fun for both young and old players. The game is free to download. If you like it and want to buy the full version then you can make a one time purchase inside the app. You will be able to continue building the world you've created in the free version. Beep, beep, Alfie Atkins is a game specially developed for children aged 3 to 9 years old. There are no elements featuring stress or timers. Children can play the game in the time they need and there's always an opportunity for them to continue playing the game.THE FREE VERSION:* 5 city blocks with roads and many construction sites where you can build houses, parks and stores/shops* 9 different mini games* 5 vehicles to drive* Totally free to play!* Totally free from 3rd party ads and commercialsTHE FULL VERSION:* The full version is purchased through the in app purchase function, this is the only purchase in the game. The player keeps all progress and can continue to build what they started in the free version* Total access to the entire world (a world that will continue to grow in future updates)* 25 vehicles (more to follow in future updates)* 15 mini games (more to follow in future updates)FEATURES: * Multi touch - play together simultaneously* Build, craft, paint, play -  explore a child's creativity  * Kid friendly interface - easy to understand and navigate* No 3rd party advertisingBeep, beep - let start!ABOUT GRO PLAY:Gro Play creates GOOD GAME experiences to entertain and inspire children and their families to learn more about health, wellbeing and sustainable living. We believe that play is not only the most fun, but also the most powerful way to learn. By entertaining and inspiring children and their parents, we are shaping a healthier and more sustainable future for us all. Gro Play is a proud winner of the Swedish Living Green award 2012.STAY TUNED Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/GroPlay Instagram: http://www.instagr.am/GroPlay Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/GroPlay Website: www.GroPlay.com
descriptionHTML:
Beep, beep! Alfie Atkins and his friends are waiting for you to visit them in their wonderous world. Together with Alfie, you will build a clean world and recycle different materials to build roads, houses, stores, schools, parks and much much more. As the community grows, you and Alfie will help the citiziens with fun things/activities in the city. You will be able to recharge your electric car, shop in the store, go to the doctor's, pick fruit, rake leaves, and stop fires with fire hose. In return you will receive lots of love from the citizens and generous rewards to continue your important work. This is a game featuring many hours of fun for both young and old players.

The game is free to download. If you like it and want to buy the full version then you can make a one time purchase inside the app. You will be able to continue building the world you've created in the free version.

Beep, beep, Alfie Atkins is a game specially developed for children aged 3 to 9 years old. There are no elements featuring stress or timers. Children can play the game in the time they need and there's always an opportunity for them to continue playing the game.

THE FREE VERSION:
* 5 city blocks with roads and many construction sites where you can build houses, parks and stores/shops
* 9 different mini games
* 5 vehicles to drive
* Totally free to play!
* Totally free from 3rd party ads and commercials

THE FULL VERSION:
* The full version is purchased through the in app purchase function, this is the only purchase in the game. The player keeps all progress and can continue to build what they started in the free version
* Total access to the entire world (a world that will continue to grow in future updates)
* 25 vehicles (more to follow in future updates)
* 15 mini games (more to follow in future updates)

FEATURES:
* Multi touch - play together simultaneously
* Build, craft, paint, play - explore a child's creativity
* Kid friendly interface - easy to understand and navigate
* No 3rd party advertising

Beep, beep - let start!

ABOUT GRO PLAY:
Gro Play creates GOOD GAME experiences to entertain and inspire children and their families to learn more about health, wellbeing and sustainable living. We believe that play is not only the most fun, but also the most powerful way to learn. By entertaining and inspiring children and their parents, we are shaping a healthier and more sustainable future for us all. Gro Play is a proud winner of the Swedish Living Green award 2012.

STAY TUNED

comments: Should be called adzy. During the level theres an ad banner at the bottom. At the end of every level there's an ad, some you can't skip and have to wait an entire 30 secs to sit through. To make matters worse, the chests can be boosted by 50% by watching, you guessed it, an ad.  They don't even give you a shop option to remove ads for a small amount of money or some sort of package. Pure plain greed

All in all it is a really great game there are very few ads, its fun, the graphics are crisp. Its amazing except for one thing. On one of the levels all of the monsters have exactly 666 health and im not religious or anything but I'm pretty sure that if some one who is religious see's that, well lets just say that it might not be good for the company, so I suggest you fix this.  Thanks.

It stopped working on my One plus! Help! I was excited about the side games! *********************************** Excellent, addictive fun. I reached shield 135 (level 1154) and it doesn't level up any more. Gutted! Still a great game but so sad I can't progress any more. No reason why really! Incidentally, good for helping kids with Mathematics.

This game is simple. So simple that it is stupidly addictive at times when my mental and physical ability equates to a bowl of fruit. Nothing in this game brings me more satisfaction than the immensity of lag when bolts are caught in rapid bounce in a confined space. I say that with the utmost sincerity, no sarcasm at all. The lag is so intense, so joyful to watch. Please don't take it away from me. It is beautiful.

Is this game for You? Do you enjoy spending most of the game watching ads? Do you enjoy games that make it impossible to play without spending real money? Do you enjoy being grabbed by the crotch so hard you change genders?  If you answered yes or no to any of these then no this game is not for you. It's nothing but a crappy game designed to rake in as much money as possible, rather than making something fun. Forced to watch 30 second ads after each round. Forced to use the currency you earn when you don't want too. Enemy power will suddenly jump up 10 fold making spells and goldimpossible to gain without watching an addition 30 second ad. Even if you win and get the key you are forced to watch a 30 sec ad to unlock as if you didn't get a key.

Concept and gameplay is ok, but, like others have said, there are way too many ads. Also the special spells you can unlock are given to you at random. Have a aituation that drill would be great for? Too bad take explosion.
description: Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You’re a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they’re fully vanquished before they reach you. Each attack you stave off will reward you with a chest. Destroy all enemies to find its key and unlock valuable diamonds and gold, which you can use to improve your strength and skill.The more powerful your spells, and the stronger your defenses, the more likely you are to succeed. Visit the laboratory to build the strength of your spells. Venture into the academy to learn special spells that will help you to defeat the enemies. And make sure to maintain the strength of your wall - these beasts have a knack for breaking through faulty barriers.Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.
descriptionHTML:
Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You’re a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they’re fully vanquished before they reach you. Each attack you stave off will reward you with a chest. Destroy all enemies to find its key and unlock valuable diamonds and gold, which you can use to improve your strength and skill.

The more powerful your spells, and the stronger your defenses, the more likely you are to succeed. Visit the laboratory to build the strength of your spells. Venture into the academy to learn special spells that will help you to defeat the enemies. And make sure to maintain the strength of your wall - these beasts have a knack for breaking through faulty barriers.

Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.

comments: Just way too many ads. Eventually you start having to watch an ad after every second other level. Its a free game, so I get it but the levels are so quick sometimes I'm watching more than I am playing. Fun game, though. Easy controls and great graphics and sound.

Good fun and very addictive. I see people moaning about the adds 😧 but what can you expect from a free game? You get an add pop up after about 5 puzzles and to be honest it is only for a few seconds....just close it if you don't want to see them.

This game is outstanding. Love the graphics, simple to understand. Some appear quite easy and then you suddenly get a level that looks like it should be but has you scratching your head for AGES!!! Love it. I can live with the adverts, just wish i could put the phone down.

Wonderful game, excellent graphics, its a free game, I solve 2 puzzles and a video ad plays I cant get over it, ad's are repeatedly played and I can't skip, but uninstalling cos too too much of ad's... after 2nd level game is very easy didn't find much interesting..
Great time killer and keeps the brain ticking good fun. Ads are annoying but it's free and you can pay about £1.50 to get rid of them if your that bothered 🤔
Saw it advertised and gave it a go. Pretty fun, once you understand the tactics it's pretty easy but I still like it. If you want to waste time, but not on a Candy Crush rip off, this is it!
description: Roll the Ball® - slide puzzle is a simple addictive unblock puzzle game, keep you playing it!Do you like the game genres as below? Great! Roll the Ball® - slide puzzle has all the elements. ;)• Sliding Puzzles, Just move and move!• Puzzle Games, Thought-provoking fun.• Maze Puzzle Games, Escape the maze.• Brain Teasers, Test yourself. Exercise your brain.• Physics Puzzler, Physics-based gaming.• Match-3 Puzzle, Easy to learn but hard to master.• Retro Games, Revisit the classics• Exam Prep & Tutoring, Practice makes perfect. comments: Love that you can now earn gems from reading.  However part of the fun of games like this is the outfits and personalization of your character. Outfits and style choices should be free to choose the best one that advances you in the story. It's not fun playing a game that forces you to fail/have a negative outcome. Big decisions/game altering choices should cost gems that makes it fun spending your savings but ultimately free outfit/style choices please

I really like 90% of this game. However, the way the passes are done really suck. I absolutely love when the 30 days unlimited ad free pass comes up for $9.99. Without it I practically refuse to play. It doesn't seem to be available as of a few days ago. I'm glad I recently purchased. Would also be cool to have a feature where you can send passes to friends.

Love this game! The only part I don't like is that all of the best options cost diamonds and you literally have to pay for them. It makes sense for an app, but it happens to often. It ruins the story because I won't buy any diamonds. I'll rate this 5 stars if they at least change it to not as often.

I like the game but waiting three hours for two passes is terrible.  And we have no other option to get free passes it is either wait or pay. I feel like I'd we got more than two passes I would be okay with the wait. But waiting three hours knowing I am going to use those two tickets in less than a half hour is crazy.  Then I will lose interest in the story and forget what had happen, it isn't okay. But other than the wait for passes I really like this game.

I really like the idea of the whole game.  And the episodes are pretty good in length depending on what story you use. But I think it is completely ridiculous that you have to wait 4 hours for more passes.  Overall,  if you don't mind waiting and are a very patient person then I do recommend this app for you.  However if patience is a virtue you don't have then you should find a different app.

Its very addictive. But they need to give more gems and free passes. I love the Deep attraction and chain reaction trilogies. Some authors first language arent English, but the stories are still well written.  A lot of profanity used in the gang stories, so be aware of that.  But this is my fave app

descriptionHTML:
Episode lets you LIVE your stories. One choice YOU make can change everything! The world’s largest home of visual stories where YOU choose your path. Or, become a creator and write your own! <3

Wouldn’t it be amazing if YOU were a character in your favorite story? Episode lets you do just that with over 75,000 gripping stories, where you make choices that matter. From your favorite movie titles like Mean Girls to fan faves such as Bad Boy’s Girl, Episode will keep you interacting for hours.

With all your favorite genres, there’s no time like the present to fall in love, rise to fame, or solve a decade-old mystery. Better yet, join this incredible community and become a creator of your own - writing stories, amassing lots of fans along the way.

Join our #episodesquad for #episodelife.

You’ve always dreamed of joining the hottest acapella group in ACA-HISTORY, the Bellas! Now you’re at Barden University and it’s your time to shine. Will you be able to balance auditions and showing off your vocal chops in the riff-off, ALL while being torn between two new love interests?

If you haven’t yet, start reading PRETTY LITTLE LIARS!

- CREATE YOUR PERSONAL LOOK & choose your best outfits

FALLING FOR THE DOLAN TWINS. On your first day in LA, you meet the cutest guy you've ever seen—then you meet his twin brother. As you get closer to Ethan & Grayson Dolan, the sparks start to fly...but who will you choose?

comments: An honestly good game with neat intentions, but I do have a complaint that is probably common for other. It's that the game just freezes abruptly and you can't do anything unless you restart it. Hopefully this gets resolved quickly, but other than that it's a good game

Best drag racing game I've played in a while, doesn't force you to spend money but the option is there.  Not in a rush for class E to be released since class D isn't finished yet, in expert races I only see a pink wire frame of the interior and no rev indicator, negatively impacting gameplay since most quests call for these races.  Otherwise great game.

Like the game so far. How do you change the camera view to inside the cockpit. There doesn't seem to be an option anywhere to change camera as advertised. Maybe I'm missing something. Other then that it's very fun game. Thank you

You guys still havent fixed the problem with the boosters for samsung. There is still a x-2 on two of the purple boosters which causes it to not appear when i go to choose it in the race.please fix the problem
It's a fun game but it won't let me buy tires even though I got more than enough money, i have 60000 dollars and cant even purchase a 7000 dollar pair of tires

Really enjoy the game it was easy to get a hang of the controls but there was a minute there i couldnt win however theres always a way to get it done. I like the cars I guess i do sorta wish you could use the expert view at all times but i do like to look at the cars. The loot drops are also better than many similar games. All in all very entertaining
description: Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!STYLINGStyling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.DRIVER'S SKILLSUpgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.TUNINGYou are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? Win them in races or use your own drafts to create parts to your liking.DRIVING PHYSICSIt's a really true-to-life racing game. Aerodynamics, tyre composition, weight distribution, power-to-weight ratio. Every detail matters!Splendid scenery, lots of bosses and competitions, chapmpionships and free races. Daily quests, achievements and leaderboards. Just what you like most. See you on the race track!

Upgrade your cars, enable new skills, use your own drafts to create new parts, apply them on your cars, and win rivals!

STYLING
Styling features allow you to change the look and feel of your car, from headlights to body kits. A wide selection of color and coloring types.

DRIVER'S SKILLS
Upgrade your driver's level by learning new skills. There are dozens of new abilities and it's up to you to decide what your build is going to be like.

TUNING
You are sure to love our non-linear car upgrade model. Hundreds of spare parts are waiting for your tweaks in the game. Don't have the right one? Win them in races or use your own drafts to create parts to your liking.

DRIVING PHYSICS
It's a really true-to-life racing game. Aerodynamics, tyre composition, weight distribution, power-to-weight ratio. Every detail matters!

Splendid scenery, lots of bosses and competitions, chapmpionships and free races. Daily quests, achievements and leaderboards. Just what you like most. See you on the race track!

comments: Think about playing all day Ridiculously good graphics for a mobile game, excellent soundtrack that matches the intensity of each level, and never gets boring. The free version makes you restart from the beginning instead of checkpoints, but I don't even mind because it's still challenging and fun with each replay. I do wish I could play in a different mode for free though. This would be an awesome Zen game.

The gameplay is unique and challenging and fun but this game feels like a demo as all the other game modes (PvP , co-op etc) are locked for free users. And you can't even use checkpoints without paying them( like SERIOUSLY?!) So once the game is over you have to start all over again if you are a free user. Apart from that this game definitely deserves a try from people looking for casual , relaxing yet challenging gameplay.

Great game This is a wonderful game, with great gameplay, amazing aesthetics and highly addictive. Totally worth the $2 for the premium version. I do have one problem though: even though I am pretty decent at the game, Google Play won't give me any achievements even though I'm sure I have earned some. It won't even let me open achievements or leaderboard pages. Is anybody else having this issue?

So fun Great graphics and its super fun and addictive especially if you like beating your own score. I gave 4 stars because I paid the 2 dollars for the full version but I find that it doesn't save where I'm at very well... Like if I leave the game and come back to it the last level I completed won't be saved. Other than that its really awesome and challenging. Hope I can get past level 8!

I love this game.  It's very simple, just go without getting hit by glass or running out of balls, but it is a lot harder than it sounds.  I am forever telling myself I have time for just one more attempt, it is very addicting.  The 3d design on this is amazing and creative.  Up at the top it says to write a SHORT review, so this will end here.

I came across this app while I was browsing for more games. Looks very well designed and I've decided to make room for this app. The very first time I played this game my mind was literally blown. Awesome music, fantastic design/graphics and very creative gameplay. It gave me a very good first impression that within 30 minutes into the game I've upgraded to premium. The different game modes accomodate various type of players. The challenges are reasonable. Literally every aspect of this game is a success. The premium upgrade is worth every cent. Who need ads if you can give a very good first impression. A simple yet sophisticated game. Very well done indeed, a must for time killer!
description: Take a surreal journey through an otherworldly dimension, move in harmony with sound and music and smash everything in your path! This experience requires focus, concentration, and timing to not only travel as far as you can, but also break the beautiful glass objects that stand in your way.* Smash your way through a beautiful futuristic dimension, smashing obstacles and targets in your path and experiencing the best destruction physics on mobile devices.* Musically synchronized gameplay: music and audio effects change to suit each stage, obstacles move to each new tune.* Over 50 different rooms with 11 different graphic styles, and realistic glass-breaking mechanics in every stage.Smash Hit is playable at no cost and free from ads. An optional premium upgrade is available through a one-time in-app purchase that will enable new game modes, cloud save across multiple devices, detailed statistics and the ability to continue from checkpoints.

description: FUN, ACTION-PACKED NINJA RPG GAMETHE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ app is a fun, creative role-playing game for 9-12-year-young ninja-in-training (and other adventurous heroes). Players are assigned important missions by Master Wu, and must rescue and team up with the rest of the brave WU-CRU – ninjas Jay, Zane, Nya, Cole and Kai – to uncover ancient secrets and hidden treasures, and battle against a lurking evil that threatens to destroy the peaceful NINJAGO Island.FEATURES -	IMMERSIVE ROLE-PLAY: Create a personal LEGO NINJAGO avatar, learn how to master the most         important ninja skills, and personalize your ninja Cru before each battle.-	FAMILIAR CHARACTERS: Rescue and fight alongside your favorite LEGO NINJAGO characters. -	EXPLORE NINJAGO ISLAND: Collect blueprints, crystals, and hidden treasures to unlock NINJAGO         vehicles.-	ENDLESS GAME PLAY COMBINATIONS: 60+ levels to unlock. -	AGE-APPROPRIATE: Engaging storylines, intuitive navigation (some reading skills required) and lots         of humor!-	SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children’s creative play.Why play with LEGO NINJAGO?LEGO NINJAGO is an immersive story about good and evil, centered around a group of five young ninja with each their elemental powers, and their training in the capable hands of old Master Wu. Friendships are forged, and evil enemies defeated in their battles to bring peace to NINJAGO Island – always with a balanced mix of danger, creativity, excitement and comic relief. And even enemies can sometimes become friends, just as friends can sometimes make mistakes. The role-playing opportunities are endless – almost anything goes in this fascinating, creative universe.Come play with us on LEGO.com/NINJAGOFor app support contact LEGO Consumer Service. For contact details refer to http://service.LEGO.com/contactusOur privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app. Read more on http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-appsLEGO, the LEGO logo, NINJAGO and the Minifigure are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2017 The LEGO Group.LEGO System A/S Website --- THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ app Support
descriptionHTML:
FUN, ACTION-PACKED NINJA RPG GAME
THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ app is a fun, creative role-playing game for 9-12-year-young ninja-in-training (and other adventurous heroes). Players are assigned important missions by Master Wu, and must rescue and team up with the rest of the brave WU-CRU – ninjas Jay, Zane, Nya, Cole and Kai – to uncover ancient secrets and hidden treasures, and battle against a lurking evil that threatens to destroy the peaceful NINJAGO Island.


FEATURES
- IMMERSIVE ROLE-PLAY: Create a personal LEGO NINJAGO avatar, learn how to master the most
important ninja skills, and personalize your ninja Cru before each battle.
- FAMILIAR CHARACTERS: Rescue and fight alongside your favorite LEGO NINJAGO characters.
- EXPLORE NINJAGO ISLAND: Collect blueprints, crystals, and hidden treasures to unlock NINJAGO
vehicles.
- ENDLESS GAME PLAY COMBINATIONS: 60+ levels to unlock.
- AGE-APPROPRIATE: Engaging storylines, intuitive navigation (some reading skills required) and lots
of humor!
- SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children’s creative play.


Why play with LEGO NINJAGO?
LEGO NINJAGO is an immersive story about good and evil, centered around a group of five young ninja with each their elemental powers, and their training in the capable hands of old Master Wu. Friendships are forged, and evil enemies defeated in their battles to bring peace to NINJAGO Island – always with a balanced mix of danger, creativity, excitement and comic relief. And even enemies can sometimes become friends, just as friends can sometimes make mistakes. The role-playing opportunities are endless – almost anything goes in this fascinating, creative universe.
Come play with us on LEGO.com/NINJAGO


For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.
For contact details refer to http://service.LEGO.com/contactus

Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app.
Read more on http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps

LEGO, the LEGO logo, NINJAGO and the Minifigure are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2017 The LEGO Group.

comments: Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

For a shoot 'em up racing android game it's really addictive. I'm always playing it. It's fun. My only complaint is the time it takes for the fuel to charge, 30 mins? Come on! Otherwise very challenging. Challenge accepted!

I would give more stars, because it's very addictive and fun to pass the time. But it just contains WAY TOO MANY ADS. Like holy crap I  get 3 different ads back to back after every single run. Kills my battery quickly and I spend more time watching the ads than I do actually playing the game.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

I really enjoyed this game until it started crashing mid game. Happened to me just recently and I wasted all my available fuel trying to frantically restart the game.  I was just completing the assigned jobs when the game suddenly stalled and I had to restart it again just to find it stalling again, all the while consuming the fuel with each restart. Hope to see this problem rectified soon, otherwise it's an enjoyable game nonetheless.

Epic old school arcade game play meets mobile app heven  This is a great game for any one that can look past In app purchases. Its loaded fool of great charectors and cars that have a usable MP3 player with some tracks . With great leveling up abilities from weapons more powerful weapons. To Nitro 2x points Health and more cars. 5 gas tanks and your either waiting or buying diamonds. What ever it is this game has even more levels . jobs for other charectors. All I now is some of the best old school arcade stand ups with that mobile app. Non stop Rockets and machine Gun blasting with some jams playing in the stereo and little cute pug dogs giving you Xp. Great FUN .....!!!!!!!

comments: It's getting frustrating.. I'm into level 14, have up graded skills and equipment but yet still can't manage to get a bronz let alone a silver or gold in the very first jump in the game. Along with finishing a constant 16th about 95% of the time make me think it's rigged. What's up with that??

Took me a little while to get the hang of the controls but it's fun once you do. Could maybe do with some hints to help get the best body position in flight, as this took me a while to figure out. Otherwise, it's a good time sink.

Sometimes it makes no sense. You are coming from quailication as 7th, you jump to 2nd position so surely you cant finish worse than 8th? WRONG. You end up on 16th place which is impossible. There is no in between you either win or you finish 14th or lower. You have 30 pts lead in front of number 2. after 1st round, you slightly fail your 2nd jump, guess what? 18th place for you! If you jump for example 120m on a K90 in Q, you finish first because everyone jumped 20m less, sudennly in 1st round you need 130m to secure your first place because everone managed to jump extra 30m. All in all fun, but still needs a lot.
No idea how the take off works, seems to be a perfect sweet spot but no tutorials to help you find it. Deleted
Every time I land, I crash. Have tried everything possible, but still always crash.
It's diffrent I've only played 10 min and your asking for a rating. Can't give a fair rating if you don't get time to play lol
