comments: I'm incredibly thankful for this game. Finally there is a game that is enjoyable, relaxing, calming and the best way to take my mind off of the worries all around us. Words cannot fully express what this game means to me! Thanks to the developers I look forward to playing everytime. The music is wonderful! I highly recommend this game. Thanks again ♡

As much as I understand that you want to make a few bucks, the amount of advertising and the way the advertising is being presented has gradually become quite intrusive and annoying. I would much rather pay a one time license fee that this crabby implementation of user annoyance  / advertising. The other problem is that on the high end phones (read pixel 2) the board are so big that the tiles as a consequence are made very small so they fit with a final result that makes it very difficult to see/read

I absolutely love this game! It's not all that noisy kids stuff! I start my day off with my tea and M.J.! It's a great way to get the Brain up and running! 💜 I've deleted the game 3 times. Alas, I just can't give up! Here I am again! And thoe I've tried alot of other similar games, it's this one that is the most satisfying! 💜

Does not even lay tiles down in a solvable fashion. Had no repeats thus shud be solvable in any order, wasn't, what's the point? Sort ur algorithm out.  Also, non stop ads and u want us to pay monthly for ad free? £8 one off fee wud b highest I went for an app I'd want to keep
Was a fun game until  after the recent update. Used to be able to close the ads, but now they just keep playing instead of closing. Will find a better version somewhere else.
The latest update places advertising banners in the play area. You can't move them or play around them and I don't want to install the advertisement app.  They suck out loud.

comments: Unique offering by Infinite .. I haven't seen a game like this before nor did I expect to .. you form a pot as it spins on a pottery wheel. You can widen it, narrow it, make it taller or shorter. The goal of the game becomes forming pots as per Aunt Chloe's instructions and then painting it as she dictates. You send the pot to her for cash.. and more pots to make. The controls are decent but a bit quirky at times when trying to form the pot.

Fantastic and very creative game... I give it 4 stars... And leave 1 star only because its brushes are not free after african.... it is my humble request to developers that please provide some more brushes for free.... And if possible (free the whole brushes 😋)... Ha ha ha ha... Nice job developers....👍👍👍 Akash Prafulla Barik "Baadal" (India)

Loved this game! A relaxing timekiller when you have nothing else to do. Quite addicting as well. Inspires me to do pottery in real life! The only things I don't like is that you have to buy the full version for $5, alhough if it was entirely free I'd probably get bombarded by ads.. A fun game, nonetheless!

I installed it for time pass, but my 21 month old baby without even we teaching her how to play, learned it on her own, and she is an expert. She gets scores as high as 272. I know it is very bad for such small baby to play in mobile, but sh gets very upset.

This game definitely deserves five stars. Here are a few reasons I love it.  1. Graphics- The quality of the app is surreal and offers the viewer a fun experience in the gameplay.  2. Gameplay- The letters/messages you receive to re-create the photo of are very intriguing in my opinion and I wish I could get the full version for more.  3. Thank You- The work that must have been put in to this game is incredible and I hope one day I can get the full version. I enjoy all of your apps and hope to see more.

It's just that you have to make the full version download free. We don't have to make the payment of the Game. When we download the game in the starting of the game we get message but after that we don't. Now l'm bored 'cause the messages for making new pots are not coming...... Pls just make it what l'm saying. But baki all is a good job..............................
description: With Let's Create: Pottery making ceramics has never been more simple and fun! Become a true artist and create "one of a kind" pottery items and share them with your friends! Throw the clay on the wheel, release all your artistic talents and take benefit of dozens of materials available in order to create your own design! Even when you glaze and fire your very first pot you will feel accomplished and relaxed as pottery is the best way to relieve your everyday stress and find your inner peace. An amazing, therapeutic and uplifting experience you can enjoy with your family and friends!Gameplay tutorial video:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Myr4kw8QMMTrailer video:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KxMb5f085lw ★★★★★ "Let's create! Pottery" is totally worth a look. The entire game is a very unique experience that works extremely well on the iPad. - Touch Arcade★★★★★ The best part about "Let's create! Pottery" is that once you've unlocked everything you can let your imagination roam free and as time-wasters go, this is a truly unique experience. - App Spy

I then pressed to race button again and again and nothing happened other than me losing all of my energy. I don't know why this happened but I'd like compensation, thank you.

Was a great game but is all messed up now.  Freezing, dropping, can barely even get races to start.  Don't know what happened but it needs to be fixed back to the way it used to be. If fixed would be all 5 stars.

I'm fed up of this game taking away my energy but not even putting me in a race! And I don't even get reimbursed for it! It connects and puts me in a race sometimes but nobody is there.... or sometimes it just glitches before putting me in to the race.......... sort it out. I'm deleting this bull.
Few glitches where it takes fuel, then never starts a race search.   But it isn't bad if I've played every day since I downloaded it.  34 consecutive days so far!

Hard to rate higher than one when it's so bugged that you can't actually race. Fix the bugs so it becomes playable again. New update just made it worse. Real shame as this is a cool game when it works.

It's a cool name. I'd like it if I could play it. But I run out of energy afternoon racing once. It goes it and either doesn't find opponents or it does then freezes and it wasted all my energy every time. Thumbs down

description: Ready, Set, Skate! Roller skate your heart out at the Skate-o-rama, and dance on wheels, in this supercool girl game! Get ready for the big Skate-Off competition! Design your own roller skating routine and impress the Skate-Off judges! Dress up in cute new skating outfits, get new makeup and a cool hairstyle at the hair salon and become the best roller skater ever! You’re gonna ROCK this roller skating girl game. You’re no newbie to the Skate-o-rama… but you want to get serious and become a roller skating pro! Your new friend at school Maddie one of the coolest girls out there and also an awesome roller skating dancer, and she’s agreed to train you! So dress up with confidence, put on some makeup, go to the hair salon to rock a new hairstyle, and get ready - with Maddie’s help and a lot of hard work, you can beat the rest of the roller skating girls, win the Skate-Off competition and impress your crush Jonny while you’re at it! Features:> Become the envy of all the roller skater girls at the Skate-o-rama, in your favorite new girl game! Your friend Maddie is going to help you be a roller skating dance star!> Practice at the skating rink - ‘til you’re ready to dress up in cute roller skating outfits to roller dance like never before, and climb the ranks of this year’s Skate-Off competition! > Look like a roller skating dance star - dress up in an outfit that shows off your inner talent! Will your crush Jonny notice YOU out of all the roller skating girls?!> Shiny nails will help you pop at the Skate-o-rama! Get a manicure and add cool nail stickers!> You’re not ready yet - you need to visit the hair salon! A fun makeover with beautiful makeup and a beautiful new hairstyle at the hair salon will complete your hot roller skating dress up look! Every good girl game needs to include a makeover!> Oh no - skating injury! Go to the doctor to get treated before the Skate-Off!> After your visit to the hair salon and makeup shop, you need to relax before the big competition at the spa!> Your new roller skating skills plus your new makeup and hairstyle are doing wonders! Reach the top of the roller skating charts and win first place! ABOUT Coco PlayCoco Play Limited is China-based developer of creative and unique apps for kids. Founded in 2013, Coco Play provides rich 3D simulation-based games for the whole family. comments: Maybe add an option to disable some graphics. Like the fimish animation. It does not add much to the game experience but it affects the performance quite a bit.  About the ads: I have premium, and I only have to watch an ad if I choose to get a reward in return. There are no sudde, unwanted or random ads anymore.

Simple game. Ads galore. Also when ads pop up better not be listening to music because it's gonna pause your music even if the ad has 0 sound. Thus the one star rating. You can advertise all you want but don't interrupt any background apps to force me to look at your ad. That's just messed up.

First of all the game it self is a great little game. Graphics are fine game play is simple and easy to pick up it's a good game. Now for the reason it only gets two stars. WAY TO MANY ADS! I mean for f@$k sake every two seconds there's an ad. Click on the car buying button there's an ad. Sit there to long there's an ad. I understand this is how you make your money but come on there's a line and you didn't just cross it you swan dived over that bad boy. I'm sorry but I do not recommended this game for anyone.

Potential to be a great game but wayyyy to many ads, like every 10 seconds of gameplay there's a 30 second ad, and when you choose to watch an ad to get a reward you never actually get it. Waste of time. No idol earnings so you have to have the app open to advance and forces you to watch more ads.i get you want to make money but this app is basically unplayable.
A 60 second add for every 30 seconds of play is ridiculous. All I can say is don't waste your time unless you like to learn how to kill a game with to many advertisments

Just...bad. The concept is simple enough. It forces you to watch ads pretty much any time you accomplish something, whether you know it or not. The mechanics are poorly-thought-out and I frequently would hit the "wrong" button while trying to play, which would cancel my productivity. Not worth my time and not worth yours.

description: Princess Irene is waiting for you at the castle, join her and discover all the girly things you can do in this stylish princess game. Makeup, hair, dress up, you can do anything you want, the only limit is your creativity!Irene has an entire makeup salon for herself. Apply the products and create a makeup look worthy of our princess. Use a soft eyeshadow, a sharp liner and finish everything off with mascara and lip gloss. Spend as much time as you wish at the princess makeup salon! All girls want to have perfect hair and princess Irene is not an exception. You're going to find awesome tools at the hair salon. Experiment with them and be creative. You can try straight hair, soft waves, bouncy curls and many other!If you like playing games for girls, you might already know what comes after makeup and hair... it's dress up! Irene has a great fashion taste and she owns the most elegant princess dresses in the kingdom. She loves to spoil herself and always wears glamorous clothes paired with precious accessories. You're going to have a great time playing dress up with her!If you love princesses, you'll never get tired of playing Royal Girls Princess Salon. Irene is not the only girl in our princess game! You will also meet her lovely BFFs. The girls are as sweet as cupcakes. Help them pick some stunning outfits so they can take a picture with the princess!Royal Girls - Princess Salon game features:👑 4 gorgeous princesses👑 makeup, hair and 2 princess dress up game levels👑 awesome hair tools (curling irons, hair straighteners, brushes)👑 amazing makeup and countless dress up combinations👑 fun and intuitive game play, perfect for little girls👑 free, no internet requiredGirls, don't miss out on the fun at the castle with princess Irene and her royal BFFs! Try one of the most fabulous princess games with makeup, hair and dress up. Discover new friends and make lots of memories. Enjoy Royal Girls Princess Salon and feel like a real princess!

description: Bring your fantasy to life with strawberry ice cream sandwiches! Cook this amazing treat by collecting the ingredients, mixing them together, as well as preparing your ice cream and your sandwiches before decorating and eating them. comments: You're just plain fun! You really understand the right amount of challenge to keep it fun but not aggravating. Have to admit I did use some hints. May I make a teeny weeny suggestion. Make a link at end to "rate the game," I wanted to, looked around, in end clicked link to play red then find yellow to do this rating... that's cuz I like yah... thanks for the smile!

This is as simple as it can be, yet perfect in every way. Relaxing music that doesn't distract you from your game, smooth gameplay, easy controls. I liked the fact that you are tossed into the game without any tutorials, left on your own. I am not really into puzzle games but I completed this game in a single afternoon and it had me asking for more.

Just finished this one less than 5 minutes ago, I'd definitely have to say I enjoyed red more. yellow had some more difficult puzzles. Some of them were (kinda?) reused in red. I overall enjoyed it a lot!   I'm really looking forward to the next one!

It's so captivating I finished it in a single morning! I love how challenging the puzzles are at the same time they are fun. The level 49 made me go crazy because I couldn't get it right, I had to draw the squares  so I wouldn't press the wrong one. I totally loved it and I'm so going to download red!

I love Bonte  games. As always, beautiful graphics and just the right level of difficulty. Looking forward to the next one. Thanks Bart. I just have to edit this to add that I don't understand why people are complaining about ads. You only need to watch them for a hint, and only briefly. It's a free game, and the developer has to make a living. You can pay to get them removed, but they really aren't obtrusive at all.

To be honest, I was like this is going to be boring 💤, but within minutes, I was totally hooked. Absolutely amazing, love it. If fact, I went straight back online and got red. I've not heard of this Bart Bonte before, but he's a bit magic.

description: Dive into the world of wild wolves and live your life as one of them! The best wolf RPG on mobile is finally here. Explore the amazing environment, develop your character and upgrade your skills to become the Alpha of your pack! You can try your strength in one of two modes: CO-OP or PVP - everything in Online Real-Time Multiplayer. Play with people from all over the World!  Online Real-Time Multiplayer RPG Stunning 3D graphicsBeautiful environmentRealistic animalsCharacter development and upgradesCooperative multiplayer hunting and PVP Battle Arena modesSmooth performanceONLINE MULTIPLAYER SIMULATORCompete with players from all around the World! The wilderness is never empty. Meet other wolves in real time and conquer the forest!CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATIONAre you a mighty Gray Wolf? A Dhole Wolf? Or maybe a mysterious Black Wolf resembles you the most? Choose your favorite and create your unique character!RPG SYSTEMYou are the king of your own destiny! There is no imposed path to follow in this simulator. Decide which attributes to develop and which skills to upgrade to become the Alpha of the pack!AMAZING GRAPHICSEnjoy the stroll around the map and admire the stunning environment! Starting from your den all the way to the mountains and streams, the high-end graphics make the game incredibly pleasant. Don’t the animals look realistic? Try and chase them all!VARIOUS GAME MODESHunting mode lets you explore the map while searching for prey: from rats and rabbits, through does, foxes and racoons, all the way to bisons and bulls. Cooperate with other players to fight the strongest opponents! If you need a bigger thrill, join the Battle Arena mode - you will be teamed up with other wolves to compete with another pack. This means war!

comments: I like the app in all, but I have some points I would like the developer to take into consideration. When a new game starts, it would be better to start with the "mine" option on and not the flag (so that you can open a new tile and not set a flag randomly), even if the flag was the last option used in the previous round. I also believe that in hard mode the game is made too random and not that skill-demanding. Other than these points it's nicely done!

I love that this game has been ported so smoothly to the phone. The most interesting part of this game is the ads, or rather, the option of ads. In since this game is free it includes ads, but you can turn them of, or change the kind of ad that you get. For this reason, i actually had the ads on, because i think the developer deserves the money he/she gets from choosing such a great system. Sadly i cannot speak for everyone. Good game.

Overall the app is really great. It's the same concept as the original PC version with just some slight changes to make it work for a touch screen. The only downside is that since you're not playing with a mouse you have to click a button at the top of the screen every time you want to switch between planting flags or revealing spaces vs using the right or left mouse buttons. But I see no way around this on a smart phone or tablet. Also, there are very minimal ads, which is awesome.

Pretty good, would like a little better graphics though, and sometimes when I go to hold it registers as a tap. Maybe it's just my phone. Also I'm not sure how close it is to the PC version (scale and such) and would like it closer. But I know its hard on a phone screen. Maybe if you made the rotation horizon, you can match the PC layout more (with the different sized boards that the PC version has)

Input delays keep getting me killed. Instead of marking a bomb my input sets it off. I'd prefer two different inputs for marking or removing tiles.  I'm using a stylus too so I know it's not an issue of accidentally hitting the wrong tile.

excellent game & one of the best minesweeper apps on the market EXCEPT there's no zoom in feature! makes it impossible to play harder modes on a phone cuz you keep accidentally tapping mines when you're trying to clear the spot next to it :(

comments: To Konami! Game controls are still a nightmare. Can you fix the right  touch in advanced controls. We can't get the ball from opponents, we can't pass,we can't shoot. We need to do this several times for it to work. Do you know that we buy coins to enjoy your super amazing game? And we enjoy it only by at least winning in Superstar level which needs speed and accuracy. Do something and don't annoy us. Kindly

Well overall it is good... Gesture controls are not that much good... So, i insisted to keep on classic controls... It helps me to make a perfect through pass and a perfect finish...but what i couldn't like is the finishing... I love football too much and i am fc barcelona follower... So i will try to make a sequence of passes and boom..! Goal... But i want to score goal by myself... Means that if i want to curve the ball so i can fool the keeper from the long distance... Similar in free kicks... There are many ways to curve the ball in... And game provides the static ways to score in free kick... So please add this functionality...  Moreover of that... I love the game ... It's good... And make it evolve

Been playing the game for a while and changing my rating to a 5.  This game is FUN.  Graphics are top notch, replays, commentay that know your actual player names.  Controls are superp ONCE YOU FIGURE THEM OUT.  Take the time to practice match mode and attack mode to pass without being offside all the time.  Downside is getting good players ridiculously hard.  And online vs another user feels like my team is in slow motion can't even make a pass or two before I'm being slaughtered by 4 goals.

Reality and an awesome soccer game fare smooth free from bugs can be used under slow network connection... U should try it. I kindly request the developers to 2 things...  1. To make the official kits available or all the users make random one. 2. To allow friendly matches extra time and penalty. Thanks

The game has started to lag after the update..gameplay is insane! Most of the balls go to the opponent.. graphics are ok..good game..plz do provide with more black balls.and if you could reduce the energy recovery time it would be great..and request you to give an option for an auction in which we can trade our players with any one playing the game..And also if you could add penalties and extra time..it wld be fun..Need energy Recovery once in a week .Great job!

I love PES18. I have changed the ratings to 1 star because KONAMI have decreased the Squad value of s18 A players and again we have to put effort to sign s18 B marquee players to increase our squad value. I don't know What is the need of this update?  I am not happy with update KONAMI or else you can change s18 A and s18 B have same squad value then I will change my rating to 5 star.

descriptionHTML:
*Philippe Coutinho, currently depicted on the app icon, is still recorded in the game as belonging to Liverpool FC. This data will be revised in the near future with an update that will reflect his current club membership.
*Downloading under Wi-Fi is strongly recommended.


NEW FEATURES TO MAKE MATCHES MORE EXCITING
The authentic soccer action of "PES" has been upgraded with data to match the start of the 2017-2018 season!
With the new "Friend" feature, you can enjoy online matches in realtime against your friends whenever and wherever you want.
If you want to play casually against nearby friends, now you can with "Local Matches" and "Local Leagues", where you create an original tournament. Enjoy heated matches against your friends and clinch the top spot!
Unforgettable soccer Legends will be introduced one after another, including BECKHAM, MARADONA, and ZICO, there's never been a better opportunity to create your ultimate dream!
Matches have been improved with the addition of new gameplay features, such as the Chip Shot and Controlled Shot.
There's also been a big overhaul to the game's sound and visuals.

THE PES 2018 MOBILE EXPERIENCE
Take total control of every action on the field in a way that only the PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER franchise can deliver!
Natural player movements, precision passing, and in-depth tactics bring the true experience of the beautiful game to your mobile device!

SWIPE TO PASS! TAP TO SHOOT!
Controller actions have been optimized to make playing on your mobile device feel as smooth and exciting as a PES action game should! Utilize PES "Advanced" controls for precise passing and controlled shooting. "Classic" virtual pad controls are also available.
Master your technique and feel the excitement of scoring the winning goal in the ultimate action soccer game!

BUILD YOUR WINNING ELEVEN TEAM
Acquire players through Scouts, Agents, or the Scout Auction.
Choose the best players to fit your unique tactics.
Every player is unique and every match is a new experience!Create your very own team and play right away!

OFFICIAL CLUB PARTNERSHIPS
Scout and recruit thousands of soccer stars from the best teams in Europe, South America, and Asia.
Prepare to feel what it takes to play with or against stars like L.MESSI, L.SUÁREZ, INIESTA, PIQUÉ and O. DEMBÉLÉ.

THE OFFICIAL "UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE"!
Experience official visuals from the "UEFA Champions League" as you compete against the top teams in Europe.


[System Requirements]
This app is an online game. Please enjoy the game with stable internet connection.

[Title Display]
If you select Japanese in the language settings of the game application, “Winning Eleven 2018” will be displayed. If you select a language other than Japanese, “PES2018 PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER” will be displayed.
developerAddress: 東京都港区赤坂9丁目7番2号
recentChanges: -Data for some teams, players, and managers will be updated.
-Stadium names will now be displayed during matches.
-The layout of Online Match Records will be reorganized.
-Manager's offensive and defensive tactics will now have an impact on each player's familiarity.
-Updates to various visual aspects of the game.
-A number of issues were fixed.
summary: New Legend Players!
title: PES 2018 PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER

comments: The game is alright, but I  have some frustrations with it. For one, sometimes when you release the ball, the aim will move suddenly and cause it to hit off of your intend target. Also, it isn't cool when you start a new level and you have no available moves (you can't pop any bubbles! ), Sometimes for a number of turns, sometimes in the middle or at the end of the level. Usually it is manageable enough. Still frustrating tho. Maybe it is an international challenge of the game..  Overall a decent game

Uninstalling. The controls are imprecise (ball would slip off the desired direction occasionally) and the order of the colours would make it impossible to win on occasion. I can forgive the first thing (muscle) but making it impossible to win is not forgivable.  Work on the algorithm.

I used to enjoy this game when I had a minute spare. I was cruising at around level 300 enjoy the simplicity of it but not anymore! Since the introduction of the "ice" balls, it's become near impossible. Reading the other comment I'm glad to see that others are frustrated with the aim moving right at the last minute. I had this at 5 stars now it's 1.

Games really nice good mind challenge, great for color match making if color blind. You may not know what colors your matching however, ever since i started playing i've also been getting better at matching my clothes and random day to day organising of colored items. Love the game however the ball simetimes seems to go where it wants to instead of where you released it... I noticed this a few times i would aim let go and the line would randomly jump to a new spot and the ball shots almost a completely diffrent location

It is a good game but is built to take $$.  There are some levels that will not let you pass without spending $$ which I refuse to do.   I understand the need to make $$, but when it is blatantly built to take money, that is where I have an issue.  I wish I could upload the video of the level this takes place in, then you would understand what I mean. Decent game but sad for the obvious reason for the game.
Too many ads. Devs are getting greedy with how many ads they put in, I got 3 before I even got to play. Don't bother with this junk.
description: Start your engines and get ready to shoot and pop all the electric bubbles until you clear the screen. Solve the fun puzzles and challenges to level up and advance along the silver map. Download for free from Google Play and join the electric factory fun with bubble shooter. Pop bubbles and explore over hundreds awesome levels filled with seriously amazing boosts, power-ups and features.- Make 7 shots in a row to earn a fireball that will burn up bubbles on the way.- Drop 10 bubbles or more and get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.Cool FeaturesAddictive gameplay. Play and enjoy hours of endless fun. Hundreds of incredible levels packed with fun puzzles and challenges. Bubble swap is free, simply tap on your bubble to change its colorAwesome graphics and effectsPlaying our game is easy, just follow these instructions: Drag your finger to move the laser aiming and lift it to shoot bubbles. You have to match at least 3 bubbles of the same color or more to pop the group and win points. Aim and pop bubbles to win levels. Remember: the fewer shots you use to complete a level, the higher score you’ll get and the chance to earn 3 stars on every level. So warm up your fingers and start working on those matching skills.

This has been my fav gameeee I swear this game you will love, and fun with.Its so easy to play, in the first time I play, i got of a score of, 131 how cool is thattt!!!. I cant even image what the new score would be in the future. I swear DOWNLOAD this game u wont regrett!!!!💕

Its a really great game and I really recommend it! The only problems I had was the controls are a little weird and there a little bit of too much ads but I dont mind it but I'd rather you fix it! Thanks for making me happy! ♡
Really good game to sit and relax but would be good if the balls could go faster than 2x speed. If you have high points then it takes a while for every turn to watch them bounce around.

Downloaded this game just to kill some time. It was fun at first but then once I started to play the challenge mode it would not let me see the whole screen during some challenges. So there is no way to win at the challenges that require you finish in a limited number of moves.

Should be an option to lock targeting  and then fire, many shots were messed up from lifting my fingure at a very slight angle.  Also check points should last longer than once. Making one mistake at lvl 190+ and then having to go back to zero was so frustrating it was the main reason i uninstalled.  Terrible shame honestly, the game could have been really fun and is an original idea

description: Ramp car game with vertical ramp is a new addition in impossible tracks racing where the player experiences a new ramp car to perform ramp stunts of mega racing games. The previous mega ramp drive games had also ramp car driving but they had not speed and new things. Those simple games lacked high speed ramp of big ramp games and drifting cars of ultra ramp games. In this ultra super sports car driving, there are utmost crazy car stunts in impossible track race. In order to enjoy this impossible racing car driving, you have to control furious racing car. This impossible racing is test for player as there are speed racer challenges of stunt car racing games. Make sure that you can easily control this crazy car game of the real impossible tracks games.The present stunt car zone is entirely different from the road tracks of the car racing simulator games and the player has car driving drift simulator which can facilitate you in this car racing simulator game. It is a real platform for you to prove yourself as car racing stunt man by showing your racing stunt skills. Be very brave to show the stunt racing skills which are in the form of impossible track stunts as the stunt challenges. You have opportunity to improve your experience of the mega ramp on the impossible race tracks which are totally different from the impossible car racing tracks. The car driving simulator is exactly like the furious mega ramp car which is capable of performing all the stunts of the track games and the impossible games.The current racing simulator is not only a racing car or the driving car but it is purely a track car which can perform high jump which is dissimilar to the truck simulator and the racing trucks. If you are in the habit of the truck race and you feel the truck simulator free as the source of frustration due to its slowness, then this game definitely offers you an open change from the monster truck game. To drive monster truck as a truck racer is comparing to nothing as the monster truck stunts are of very low status. So, don’t waste your time anymore and be the part of the current crazy car impossible stunts of the ramp jumping games. Feel the difference through this new episode and mark your presence in the ever-increasing world of car stunt games.Features:Real car drivingRacing challengeDangerous tracksCrazy car stuntDeadly racersVertical rampTwo way rampsWanted car racing Come to take part in this stunt zone of the ramp car game with the help the ramp car of the mega ramp games and make people aware about your command of vertical ramp in this impossible track racing.

comments: Lost another These constant updates caused me to uninstall this. Fun game - very good game!But if it ain't broke don't fix it. I will not sacrifice all the other good games I have for this single one. Now with google only allowing so many apps ( no writing to sd card). Atleast if you update you should let people keep playing with version they have. Make updates optional.

It's a fun game. If you're a COD player you'll love it. In general It does good on it's own as a solid shooter. Only thing I think you really, REALLY need to change is the way to get weapons. Using rentals is great, picking up enemy or ally weapons, sure, but having to spend money to get most weapons, if not all, seems a little unfair. It's good that there's a grind to get them but I think it's a little overkill how difficult it is. I think levels should determine what you unlock, then use silver (make it easier to get) to purchase it. Or, if players want to speed up the process, use gold.

I really like the game. Fun, exciting, and addictive. The only problem I have is that the rewards you get are not nearly enough as I think they should be. Exp gains are good, but cash gains are so bad and you will have to play for hours to accumulate cash and then you can buy HALF of a weapon, because they require a lot of cash to get one. You also can barely upgrade weapons without any gold and you can just forget about that unless you put some real world currency in this game, which is a real shame. As a player I know we would like to buy and upgrade our own weapons instead of having to "rent" which is an option in the game.

Great game play, Great graphic, but after 1 month, I think this is another pay to win game ; the great Gun need to buy,  the Armor need to buy, almost every wining key things need to buy. But some people really like it because they have money to buy all those and "WIN" other pool guy. it is not about skill, it is about money.

Awesome graphics, and for what you get on a phone, it really is an amazing game. The only complaint (if you can even call it that) I have is the controls can be a little tricky as sometimes when you're trying to swing left or right you can accidentally change your weapon instead of swing to either side. Aside from that, tremendous gameplay, multiple modes to play, amazing graphics, really just an awesome game. Make sure you have a really good internet connection.

Be prepared the stupidity. 230 armor 120 health isnt enough to protect against the remington. So if u want to survive be prepared to pay more and more always. This game aint fun after a while. More annoying really. Otherwise would recommend it. So look elsewhere if u dont want to pay a hell of a lots of money
description: WORLD WAR HEROESFight soldiers from all over the world in the best World War II online shooter for Android!This game will take you to World War II, where you’ll able to use military vehicles to conduct battles.The game features 7 game modes:✯ Hardcore ModeMode increase the damage and makes the game more realistic;✯ DeathmatchFree fight for all. You fight for yourself. Player with the highest score wins the round, 1-2 hits and you lost, just like in real life.✯ Team DeathmatchTwo teams fight for domination. The team with the highest score at the end of the round wins.✯ Bomb ModeOne team should bring and plant a bomb at the indicated point, the other team must prevent it!✯ Team SquadTwo teams fight each other with no respawns. The team which has at least one member alive wins.✯ Team battle on panzersTwo teams are fighting each other for superiority using heavy machinery. The team that has the most points at the end of the round wins.✯ Custom ModesCreate a game with your own rules! Tell your friends game number in the statistics window when you create a room and play together!Features: ✯ 7 legendary World War II battles!✯ 4 types of battle vehicles from different countries: USA, Russia, Japan, and Germany!✯ 5 game modes and a custom mode with your own rules!✯ 57 unique weapon types: pistols, assault rifles, machine guns, shotguns and many more!*Reminder: Join tournaments to win prize, raise your clan!More features: ✯✯✯ Login to Get Daily Free Gifts ✯✯✯Login to Get Daily Free Gifts, Login to get Free Daily Quests!Login to get daily free items. Don’t also miss the bonus EXP and Credits time!　✯✯✯ 50+ Weapons, Customize yourself  ✯✯✯50 types of weapons: guns, pistols, tommy-guns, subguns, grenades, rockets and body armors!Customize your weapon and get a unique test piece – change the color and get all options, from barrels and stocks to scopes.✯✯✯ Upgrade gear system ✯✯✯Upgrade your gear and become stronger!Claim first place and give a headshot to the one who will dare to contest the air!Regular updates and new elements are waiting for you. This year’s best graphics and perfectly matched sounds will make you spend your time playing WWH!GOOD LUCK SOLDIER!========================https://www.facebook.com/WorldWarHeroesOnline/YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChMfgo6g8ri0FaAR-SpYpXw
descriptionHTML:
WORLD WAR HEROES
Fight soldiers from all over the world in the best World War II online shooter for Android!
This game will take you to World War II, where you’ll able to use military vehicles to conduct battles.

The game features 7 game modes:

✯ Hardcore Mode
Mode increase the damage and makes the game more realistic;

✯ Deathmatch
Free fight for all. You fight for yourself. Player with the highest score wins the round, 1-2 hits and you lost, just like in real life.

✯ Team Deathmatch
Two teams fight for domination. The team with the highest score at the end of the round wins.

✯ Bomb Mode
One team should bring and plant a bomb at the indicated point, the other team must prevent it!

✯ Team Squad
Two teams fight each other with no respawns. The team which has at least one member alive wins.

✯ Team battle on panzers
Two teams are fighting each other for superiority using heavy machinery. The team that has the most points at the end of the round wins.

✯ Custom Modes
Create a game with your own rules! Tell your friends game number in the statistics window when you create a room and play together!


Features:

✯ 7 legendary World War II battles!
✯ 4 types of battle vehicles from different countries: USA, Russia, Japan, and Germany!

Claim first place and give a headshot to the one who will dare to contest the air!

comments: Its way to hard to win and and the stats do nothing.  You have to be perfect and even then they fly by.  Still LOVE this game.  Just takes away the fun when you get left in the dust and you play the same lvl a million times hoping maybe one time you will be perfect.

I expected the physics to be as flawless as Turborilla's MX games but they're not at all. Clunky, inconsistent physics leave you shaking your head and trying in vain to sum up what you did differently than the 100 previous attempts.

Disappointing...the game would easily be 5 stars, as it is very fun, but once you reach a certain point, it becomes pay to play as you need gold to upgrade your bike to stay competitive with the CPU rider.  Can't even play anymore because it's impossible to progress any further.

Awesome game!  Earning money is easy especially with online play and watching ads.  ONLY downfall is earning gold can be a pain,  seem like the only way to get gold is by beating a boss, buying gold with real cash and levelling up which can take some time.  Other then that it's a very addictive game if you love BMX that is.  Folloq me on instagram @evans_customz

Very good game but I wish there was a better way of getting gold without having to pay out of your hard working money. Since when did games start asking for cash? I would pay to buy the game but buying gold is stupid as hell.. either way very good game
Game is very addicting but after a little while of playing you can't hit jump or land! Maybe just me? Also, I don't want to pay for upgrades. Should be merit based on how well you race.
description: Mad Skills BMX 2 has finally arrived! See for yourself why Mad Skills games have been installed more than 40 million times worldwide, by action sports enthusiasts, professional athletes, and casual gamers alike. descriptionHTML:
Mad Skills BMX 2 has finally arrived! See for yourself why Mad Skills games have been installed more than 40 million times worldwide, by action sports enthusiasts, professional athletes, and casual gamers alike. This is side-scrolling racing action as you’ve never experienced it, racing against people from across the globe on carefully designed tracks that will challenge your skills and — sometimes — your sanity.

- Amazing physics that combine elements of realism with arcade fun
- 7 different bikes that can be unlocked, upgraded, and customized
- Tons of rider customization options to help you achieve your own on-track look
- Dozens of hand-crafted tracks, with more added every single week for free
- Weekly Jam competitions carried over from the smash-hit game Mad Skills Motocross 2
- Competition with friends, people from your state or region, and international players
- Evil bosses to defeat — a Mad Skills first!


Mad Skills BMX 2 will get major developer support, ensuring tons of meaningful updates in the weeks, months, and years to come. We already have additional game modes in the works!

comments: I absolutely love this game. It's so addictive and a really good game if your bored. I'm really curious to find out what happens when you have collected all the balls, does the game just carry on or is their more challenges?? Overall, this game gets five stars from me 😚

Its a really good game. The only thing is, that I wish there was maybe some instructions that appear at the beginning, because I didnt know that you couldnt hit the black lumps etc. Maybe if you add little phrases that say what to do and not to do, then it would be almost perfect.

Great time killer I love everything about it and it is a great game to wake up to. The only down side is that you fall off the ledge and that makes it harder to dodge the black. Everything else is 5 stars so that is what I think about roller coaster.
Its really fun and addictive. Awesome game play and good for passing time. Not always so friendly to my battery and too many adds. Other than those little hick ups I absolutely love it.

I think that it is ok. I don't play it a lot because its not really fun to me I think that I am going to cleat it because I don't like it that much. I don't like it there are to many adds. They always happened at the beginning and I hate it. I don't think you should not install it its not fun.

This game is amazing! It is addicting and fun to play!! The only thing is that I was hoping for some sort of introduction to the game, to tell me how to play etc. Also, I was hoping to be able to choose what kind of ball i use, the black one is plain and kind of boring. But overall its an amazing game!!

comments: Loading to start game is rediculus. Takes 1gb nearly everytime you load it. It's a kids game, people don't have the money to keep up with the difficulty. I will be unsubscribing, subscription doesn't justify the price, everything costs too much and can't progress in the game because of price. Great game, shame it's destroyed by greed.

.     It doesn't tell you how to get past level 75. Or how super power your dinosaurs,  example the opponents dinosaurs that have the purple glow. I WORKED SO HARD TRYING TO GET A VIP CREATURE IN THE NEW PRIZE DROP FEATURE AND WHEN I GET  ONE IT CHRASHED ON ME AND DIDN'T GIVE ME ANYTHING. Ludia can you give me one back because I dont think that is fare.

I was enjoying this game for 5 minutes, and then I couldn't get into it anymore. It tells me to make more then 900 mb space even though I just deleted a couple of gb worth of apps. Once I can play this again it will be fun

It's a great game but it's such a money pit. 9 out of 10 times if you want something, you better get a credit card out otherwise you're waiting 4 days to unlock it. If it weren't for that, I'd have given 5 stars.

I am pretty annoyed by the creation lab. Over 10 attempts to merge a triceratops to get to level 21. Still unsuccessful.  You have to wait 30 minutes between each attempt but its not like I have the time to play every 30 minutes just to be disappointed. So far I have been attempting the same dinosaur for over 24 hours.
description: Return to Isla Nublar with the creators of the smash hit Jurassic Park™ Builder for your next adventure: Jurassic World™: The Game, the official mobile game based on this summer’s epic action-adventure. Bring to life more than 150 colossal dinosaurs from the new film and challenge your opponents in earth-shaking battles. Construct the theme park of tomorrow in this unrivaled build-and-battle dinosaur experience.In order to build a winning Battle Arena team, you’ll need to design the most efficient and effective park, one that will allow your dinosaurs to thrive and evolve. Discover new and amazing species of dinosaurs by acquiring surprise-filled card packs. Join Owen, Claire and your favorite characters from the film as, daily, you feed and genetically enhance your dinosaurs. Now that the park is open, it’s time to make Jurassic World™ your own!In Jurassic World™ The Game you will:* Defy the laws of science as you COLLECT, HATCH & EVOLVE more than 150 unique dinosaurs!* CONSTRUCT & UPGRADE iconic buildings & lush landscapes inspired by the film. * CHALLENGE opponents from around the world in earth-shaking BATTLES!* INTERACT with characters from the film as you navigate exciting new storylines & thrilling missions! * ENHANCE your experience with Hasbro® Brawlasaurs™ toys – scan each toy dinosaur & battle with it directly in the game!* CHOOSE from multiple card packs; each can bring a special dinosaur to life!* EARN daily rewards such as coins, DNA & other essential resources.Membership* Jurassic World The Game offers a monthly subscription at USD $9.99, please note prices may vary depending on sales taxes or countries. * The user will be asked to login to his Google account (if not already) prior to the purchase. * The payment will be charged to Google Account at confirmation of purchase. * Additional information will be provided afterward stating that subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. * We also mention there that subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.* The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. * No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.* Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.Privacy policy can be found at http://legal.ludia.net/mobile/privacy_black.php Terms of service can be found at http://legal.ludia.net/mobile/terms_black.phpBy installing this application you agree to the terms of the licensed agreements.Like us on Facebook for fan giveaways, the latest news and updates! (facebook.com/jurassicworldthegame)Jurassic World™ is a trademark and copyright of Universal Studios and Amblin Entertainment, Inc. Licensed by Universal Studios Licensing LLC. All rights reserved. Please note:  Jurassic World™: The Game is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

description: A super fun driving game for youngsters! -Join BabyBus - Baby Panda’s School Bus :【Be a Cool Driver】 Drive the bus down Cherry Blossom Road and over Rainbow Bridge. Beep beep!【It’s Class Time】 Are you ready for kindergarten? Go shopping for school supplies, get a health check-up and more! 【Fun Learning Environment】 Toys, tea-parties, and friends! Learning’s never been so fun!【Traffic Safety Tips】 Saftey first when you’re driving the school bus!Descriptions of Amazing BabyBus:1. Drive the School Bus and pick up all your friends!2. Remember to fasten the seat belt!3. Let’s go shopping for all the things you’ll need at school! Blankets, school bags, pencil boxes and more for kindergarten!4. Check out the school’s photo studio! A lot of beautiful clothes to dress up. Let’s enjoy the costume party!5. Drive the School Bus to the hospital to get a health check-up: measure the height, weight, hearing, heartbeat and more!6. in the classroom play with toys, eat snacks and enjoy kindergarten life!Features of Drive Amazing BabyBus -Baby Panda’s School Bus:1. Virtual Driving lets children enjoy the fun experience of driving a school bus.2. An educational app which prepares for preschool children.3. Game helps kids to simulate going to school in a fun and exciting way.4. Learn and explore.About BabyBus—————At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity, we design our products from the kid’s perspective to help them explore the world on their own.   BabyBus has offered a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for 250 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have produced more than 150 children's educational games, 700 children's songs, and animations of various themes spanning the arts, health, and science.                      —————Contact us: ser@babybus.comVisit us: http: //www.babybus.com For more videos, subscribe to BabyBus on YouTube! ►► https://goo.gl/llI2fX
descriptionHTML:
A super fun driving game for youngsters! -Join BabyBus - Baby Panda’s School Bus :

【Be a Cool Driver】 Drive the bus down Cherry Blossom Road and over Rainbow Bridge. Beep beep!
【It’s Class Time】 Are you ready for kindergarten? Go shopping for school supplies, get a health check-up and more!
【Fun Learning Environment】 Toys, tea-parties, and friends! Learning’s never been so fun!
【Traffic Safety Tips】 Saftey first when you’re driving the school bus!

Descriptions of Amazing BabyBus:
1. Drive the School Bus and pick up all your friends!
2. Remember to fasten the seat belt!
3. Let’s go shopping for all the things you’ll need at school! Blankets, school bags, pencil boxes and more for kindergarten!
4. Check out the school’s photo studio! A lot of beautiful clothes to dress up. Let’s enjoy the costume party!
5. Drive the School Bus to the hospital to get a health check-up: measure the height, weight, hearing, heartbeat and more!
6. in the classroom play with toys, eat snacks and enjoy kindergarten life!

Features of Drive Amazing BabyBus -Baby Panda’s School Bus:
1. Virtual Driving lets children enjoy the fun experience of driving a school bus.
2. An educational app which prepares for preschool children.
3. Game helps kids to simulate going to school in a fun and exciting way.
4. Learn and explore.

About BabyBus
—————
At BabyBus, we dedicate ourselves to sparking kids' creativity, imagination and curiosity, we design our products from the kid’s perspective to help them explore the world on their own.

BabyBus has offered a wide variety of products, videos and other educational content for 250 million fans from ages 0-8 around the world! We have produced more than 150 children's educational games, 700 children's songs, and animations of various themes spanning the arts, health, and science.
—————

Visit us: http: //www.babybus.com
For more videos, subscribe to BabyBus on YouTube! ►► https://goo.gl/llI2fX
